description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 這個課程設計的目的，在於讓學生熟悉專業人員應具備的相關倫理與法律議題，學生不僅將重新思索在專業職涯與生活中倫理所扮演的主要角色，並且探索專業人員在面對道德與人際關係兩難時的倫理運用與法律原則。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to make students re-think the main character between professional jobs and living ethics, and discover the principles of ethics and laws when the professional faces the dilemma of morality and interpersonal relationship.

notes: 哲學向度，上課地點：設計B01

description.zh: 這個課程設計的目的，在於讓學生熟悉專業人員應具備的相關倫理與法律議題，學生不僅將重新思索在專業職涯與生活中倫理所扮演的主要角色，並且探索專業人員在面對道德與人際關係兩難時的倫理運用與法律原則。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to make students re-think the main character between professional jobs and living ethics, and discover the principles of ethics and laws when the professional faces the dilemma of morality and interpersonal relationship.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 主要介紹結構陶瓷，生醫陶瓷，複合陶瓷等。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Structural Ceramics.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

notes: 材料所與材料所在職專班合開

name.en: Special Topics of Instrumental Analytical Chemistry

description.zh: 由量子化學及結晶化學等理論為基礎，討論一些分析儀器的原理，構造及應用。特別是原子光譜法，電化學分析法及離子層析儀及質譜儀等，針對無機物之分析方法。
description.en: Considering the theories of quantum and crystal chemistry, discuss the theories, structure and applications of some instruments.  Those are used for chemical analysis, especially for inorganic materials: atomic spectroscopy, electrochemical analysis methods, ion-exchange chromatography and mass spectroscopy.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 課程內容包含薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: The course mainly lecture the materials and products which are made by powdermetallurgy techniques, including high melting material, super hard material, superheat resistant material, sintered electricjoint material, sintered mechanical parts, sintered friction material, sintered magnetic material, etc., it is expected students wholearn the powder metallurgy course may have further understanding to theapplication of powder metallurgy techniques.

description.zh: 本課程在討論金屬.陶瓷與高分子性質與應用在整形外科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the properties of metallic, ceramic and polymeric materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materials for dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

notes: 請改選材料所「生醫材料」【停開】

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 材料表面處理是各種製造工業不可或缺的過程，不論是傳統的工業或現代的高科技產業，表面處理都一直扮演著極重要的角色。本課程主 要是對表面處理技術在理論基礎，方法與應用等方面的講述，以期 培養學生的興趣與專業的知識。課程內容包括表面處理技術的基本 理論，前處理技術，各種表面處理的方法與相關知識，以及各種表面處理技術的應用等項目。
description.en: Surface coating and chemical surface treatment are the main subjects to be taught in this course. The phase composition of the each coating methods is introduced initially. Association of theses process with chemical pre-treatment of the material surface is reviewed next. Both experimental procedures and techniques base on concepts of electrode reactions and impedances are discussed during the entire presentation of this course.

description.zh: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作及計算等。包括光譜化學，原子吸收光譜，電漿發射光譜儀，發光光譜儀，電分析化學，PH計，電解沉澱法，伏安法，極譜儀，等儀器之探討。
description.en: This course discusses the theoryof instrumental analysis operation, the principle of instrument, structural operation and calculation. It includes spectrum chemistry, atomic absorption spectrograph, plasma jet spectrograph, light spectrograph, electric analytic chemistry, PH meter, electrolytic precipatation, volt ampere, polar spectrograph, etc..

description.zh: 隨著先進能源科技的快速進展，各種形態能源的生產、儲存、再生、與利用成為技術發展的重點。材料科技是提升能源效率的重要一環，本課程結合包括金屬、陶瓷、高分子、奈米等複合材料系統，討論材料在在包括儲氫合金、二次電池、燃料電池、太陽能電池、熱電、超電容等新型能源儲存或生產等裝置上的應用領域與其限制。
description.en: The demands for advanced energy requires the development of technologies for sustainable energy production, converting, and storage. Materials are key blocks to improved performance in new energy technologies. These new materials systems often combine the knowledge in the fields of metals, ceramics, polymer, and nano-materials. This course will discuss the applications and limits of materials in hydrogen storage, secondary batteries, fuel cells, solar cells, thermoelectric devices, and supercapacitors to give undergraduate students a basic understanding of energy-related materials.

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 主要課程內容包括Visual Basic或C程式語言介紹及應用。
description.en: The major course includes the introduction of Visual Basic or C programming language and application.

notes: 限工程學士班，材二甲以上重補修；電腦教室，限40

description.zh: 此課程之教學內容包括：概論與儀器使用，字法與線法，應用幾何學，投影幾何學，正投影法則與基本製圖，曲線軟體，機械工作圖及製圖軟体使用。
description.en: The content of this course include the brief introduction and instrument application, The drawing of line, lettering, applied geometry, descriptive geometry, orthography projective rule and fundamental graphics, curve line software, mechanical working drawing, and graphics software application.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的教育哲學架構，課程包 括三大部份，第一部份探討哲學的基本課題與哲學和教育的關係；第 二部份探討傳統和當代教育哲學所面對的基本問題，以及它們對教育 實務所能提供的回應之道；第三部份涉及發展個人教育哲學之重要，方法與推行時可能受到的挑戰。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 1-1具備教育專業知識並掌握重要教育議題之能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。3-1具備發揮班級經營效能營造支持性學習環境之能力。3-2具備掌握學生差異進行相關輔導之能力。4-1具備善盡教育專業責任之能力。5-1具備致力教師專業成長之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The goal of this course is to offer a conceptual frame of educational philosophy. The course is divided into three sections. Part I deals with basic issuers in philosophy and the relationship between philosophy and education. Part II is a survey of how traditional and modern philosophies have faced the basic philosophic issuers, and the alternatives they have developed for educational practice. Part III discusses the need for developing personal philosophy of education, some ways of building such a philosophy, and some of the challenges involved in implementing that philosophy.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討些最近發展之最佳化方法如模擬退火法，類種經網路，基因法則及塔布搜尋等。此外，相關之文獻及運用之領域將深入討論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study some new optimization methodologies,like simulated aunealing, neural networks,genetic algorithm, and Tabu search. Becises, the related literature reviews and applications areas wii be focused.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

name.zh: 雲端應用程式開發與應用

description.zh: 雲端運算所衍生出的商機有軟體服務（SaaS，Soft as Service）、平台服務（PaaS，Platform as Service）、設備服務（IaaS，Infrastructure as Service），相關的架構及服務也不斷地被提出，未來如智慧型手機、智慧家庭、工業4.0及大數據分析等都可以透過雲端運算，發展出更多的應用服務。希望可以透過此課程，能讓學生獲得雲端運算的基礎技術，以及雲端應用程式開發與服務建置。
description.en: This is an introduction course of cloud-based computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of cloud technology; and applications, 2. Cloud-based application development 3. Cloud-based platform Introduction

name.zh: 資訊與通訊科技在工業工程之應用
name.en: Information and Communication Technologies for Industrial Engineering

description.zh: 智慧手機、智慧車、智慧家電、智慧電網、智慧化控制系統等，一場科技革命正熱鬧展開。看似單一產品的創新，背後其實有著更大的驅動力，那就是當行動通訊與網際網路結合後，催生出來的Mobile Internet新領域，所有資料都上網、所有物品都連網、所有人都掛網，個人到企業都必須做好準備，因此，當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，工業工程系責無旁貸的需將行動運算納入考量。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解雲端運算在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂服務導向的企業，以及提供進階之程式開發知識，與跨入3G最新手機開發平台，培養未來開發手機程式設計之技術實力，使學生具備獨立開發手機應用程式的能力。
description.en: This is an introduction course of mobile computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of mobile technology; and applications, 2. Location-based service 3. Could-based computing 4. Mobile applications; 5. Mobile programming

description.zh: 隨著網路的迅速發展，電子商務更是也以每年20%成長率蓬勃發展，台灣預計將突破兆元的商機。在台灣下階段將邁入以生產力4.0作為科技發展的主軸，為因應同學畢業後的就業需求，本課程介紹電子商務的各種重點技巧，包括社群行銷與、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、網路外銷，Google管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，行動行銷，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學了解網路行銷及電子商務之實務運作。
description.en: This course will introduce all the internet commerence techniques generally. Let them know what is internet commerence and how it works.

notes: 須先修過網路創業大三,工管所與最後一哩合開,電腦教室

description.zh: 於品質要求提升之情況下，自動化檢測系統成為現行產業界重要開發之工具之一，故本課程之目的在教授開法PC-based自動化檢測系統之基本知識與技能，主要在培養未來自動化檢測之開發技術人員。課程內容包括：3D CAD 繪圖設計、BCB程式介面之開發與設計、PC-based自動化控制、光學檢測之技術、e-Vision之使用、OpenCV之程式設計、基礎資料庫之應用、品質管制圖之原理及使用、及其他檢測相關技術等。
description.en: Quality has been one of the most important issues in currently manufacturing industry such that automated inspection system becomes a crucial tool.  Therefore, the objective of this course is to offer the basic knowledge and skill in developing a PC-based automated inspection system.  The content of this course includes: 3D CAD design, programming design using Borland C++ Builder, PC-based motion and I/O control, inspection design with e-Vision, basic programming design using OpenCV, database design, quality control chart, and related knowledge about inspection tools.

notes: 四工三甲乙與工管所合開，限25人(科研640室)

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。本課程之內容如下：  1.物流管理和策略  2.運輸和配送  3.保管與包裝  4.定單處理  5.採        購  6.物料搬運  7.物流成本  8.物流服務  9.資訊系統10.物流生產力衡量
description.en: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place,and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way.The content of the course discription:  1.Transpor totion  2.Inventory maintenance  3.Order processing   4.Purchasing   5.Warehousing & packaging  6.Materials handling  7.Logistics costs  8.Logistics customer serrice  9.productivity meajurement

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

notes: 四工三甲、四甲、工管所合開

name.en: The applications of TRIZ creative method

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"系統化創新"是企業不可或缺的競爭策略及唯一的生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地應用。本課程以TRIZ創新方法為基礎，詳細的介紹系統性創新理論及實務的解題手法及落實創新方法之實務應用，可以很有系統地帶領學生們拓展革新思維，有效及系統化之應用於各種產業。讓學生也有機會應用於生活問題的解決。
description.en: Nowadays, enterprises in the phase of violating competence and decreasing profit. To make it survival, enterprises need to implement a systematic innovation technique, but only few companies really understanding and implement. The aim of this course is based on the applications of TRIZ creative method in detail which including the theory of systematic innovation and application, and also leading students to learn how the TRIZ works, and practice to solve their real life and various industries problems.

notes: 限大四和研究所(四工四甲乙、工管所與最後一哩合開)

name.zh: 社會新鮮人的職場經驗分享

description.zh: 本課程透過經驗分享使面臨就業職場之應屆畢業新鮮人能吸取社會中間精英實戰經驗，利用介紹職場生涯規劃工具(如SWOT分析、個人夢想、價值觀、潛能開發等)，協助我們畢業生能將個人夢想、價值觀、人生目標與行動策略協調一致，去除不必要摸索，整合個人最大的優勢與資源，取得職場生涯規劃之成功的機會。本課程以案例討論為主題，聘請企業專家實際帶領學員運用工具及手法，學習掌握的個人人生目標，進一步的更有效的幫助年輕人快樂的就業、達成幸福的發展生涯。
description.en: This course will invite experienced practitioners to introduce and share their success experiences. The planning tools (SWOT analysis, personal dreams, values, potential development, etc.) will be applied as well. It helps our graduates for coordinating the action plans of personal dreams, values, goals and strategy to remove unnecessary searching. This class also integrates the best personal strengths and resources to obtain an opportunity for a successful career plan. This course is focused on the case discussions and lead students to learn to how to achieve personal life goals of more effective and happier career development.

notes: 限大四；四工四甲乙與最後一哩合開，限50人

description.zh: 介紹數位遊戲設計的基礎知識、操作技術、與設計流程。
description.en: Introduction to the basic knowledge and technologies for the design and development of digital games.

notes: 視傳組,四互動二與四資二合開,使用資工系(科研1223室)

description.zh: 人類在從事數學演算、推理交談、觀察等各類動作時，均展現出 "智慧"的現象。人工智慧即是利用電腦結合基本理論在有限度的範圍內從事上述各項工作，其中涵蓋了－自然語言了解、機器人學、電腦視覺、類神經網路、專家系統、自動化定理證明等，而本課程則主要在於提供必要之基礎，主要內容包括：1.搜尋法則，2. 命題與敘述邏輯，3. 定理證明，4. 知識系統與知識表達， 5. 機器學習， 6. 基因與演化計算，7. 智慧型代理人。
description.en: Artificial intelligence seeks to introduce the elements of intelligence into programs and systems in application domain. Topics will include 1. Searching methods 2. Propositional and Predicate logic 3. Theorem Proving 4. Knowledge-based systems and representation of knowledge 5. Machine learning, 6. Genetic algorithms and evolutionary computing, 7. Intelligent agents.

description.zh: Apple推出iPhone以及iPhone SDK 後，造成了一股不可擋的智慧型手機革命，由於相較於桌上型和筆記型電腦，手機是人們日常生活中更容易貼近使用的行動裝置，因此，手機中的App 更可以幫助人們解決生活中的問題。本課程將由最基本的入門點切入，前段會先帶領同學針對Objective-C 語法，委派設計(Delegate)模式等iOS入門的幾大難題上課，接著利用Storyboard建構出常見的iOS app 使用者介面，最後再教導同學用OpenGL es 實作有趣的3D 應用程式。本課程大致如下：1. 導論2. Objective-C3. iOS系統架構4.Xcode開發工具安裝與使用5.基礎UI設計與多國語言6. 核心應用程式設計7. 感應器應用8. 多媒體與相機功能9. OpenGL ES10. 擴增實境11. 專題實作及評鑑
description.en: In this course, you will get hands-on with the Apple SDK and learn how to use Objective-C to build the apps from scratch; You will be equipped to develop iOS apps, including 3D Apps through an understanding of the following course materials:˙Introduction to iOS˙How to program in Objective-C˙Using X-Code ˙The basics UI design of an iPhone/iPad application˙iOS MVC structure˙Use of sensors, the GPS, and cameras˙Multimedia functions – how to play audio and video files˙OpenGL ES for 3D/AR application˙Project Demo and Review˙How to publish an iPhone/iPad application

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

name.zh: 行動應用軟體開發技術

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉開發行動應用軟體所需之各項整合技術。課程內容包括： 1. 行動應用軟體設計概觀  2. Android SDK 與 Eclipse 開發工具  3. iSO SDK 與 Xcode 開發工具  4. 內建裝置應用設計(I)：Accelerometer、振動、Media Player  5. 內建裝置應用設計 (II)：GPS、Map  6. 網路應用設計(I)：Web Service，JSON  7. 網路應用設計 (II)：AJAX，JavaScript，JQuery  8. 資料庫應用設計：SQLite  9. 社群應用軟體開發  10. App Store 應用軟體行銷  11. 行動應用軟體設計趨勢  12. 期末專題製作
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge and practices to develop mobile applications.  This course covers the technical foundations of the mobile application development skills through readings, lectures, and class projects.  Course topics include: 1. Overview  2. Android SDK and Eclipse Development Tools  3. iSO SDK and Xcode Development Tools  4. Media and Camera Application Design：Video、Audio、and Photo APIs  5. Location and Sensors Application Design：GPS、Map APIs  6. Connectivity Application Design(I)：Web Service，JSON  7. Connectivity Application Design (II)：AJAX，JavaScript，JQuery  8. Database Application Design：SQLite  9. Social Application Design  10. App Store and Applications Marketing  11. Mobile Application Development Trend   12. Final Project

notes: 四資四與資工所合開，科研1223

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務、程式設計有一全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端儲存系統架構、儲存網路與虛擬化技術， 2. 業務持續運作儲存技術，3. 儲存架構安全與管理 ，4. 雲端排程技術、效能與安全，5.虛擬化資料中心建置-虛擬計算、儲存、網路、桌面與應用，6.雲端服務與管理，7.雲端運算發展概論與企業應用，8.大量資料運算及案例分析，9.Hadoop 與 Mapreduce，10.雲端運算之SaaS架構，11.實習課程與專題計畫。
description.en: This course focuses on information storage management, infrastructure, service management, security, and migration strategy for Cloud computing as well as the practice of cloud application through readings, lectures, and class projects. Course topics include: 1. Storage Networking Technologies and Virtualization, 2. Business Continuity, 3. Storage Security and Management, 4. Cloud Scheduling, Performance and Security, 5. Virtualized Data Center building blocks - Virtual Compute, Storage, Network, Desktop, and Application, 6. Cloud Services and Management, 7. Cloud Computing Overview and Business Application, 8. Big Data Computing and Case Study, 9. Hadoop and Mapreduce, 10. Cloud SaaS, 11. Lab. and Final Project.

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 服務設計的方法乃是透過相關資源做適當的規劃與組織，已提昇使用者與服務提供者間之服務及互動的品質。其主要的架構與方法乃在於了解使用者的行為、需求及動機後，創造具友善性、競爭性、及相關性的使用者經驗。本課程將以服務設計的概念與方法為核心，以使用者需求及經驗的創造為基礎，探討並分析不同的互動技術的適用情境及其發展與應用領域。
description.en: Service design is the activity of planning and organizing related resources of service in order to improve its quality and the interaction between service provider and users. The backbone of service design methodologies is to understand the behavior of the users, their needs and motivations, so that to create user-friendly, competitive and relevant service to the users. The service design concepts and methodologies and user experience analysis are used in this course for discussing the developments and applications of interactive technologies in the aspects of various scenarios and application fields.

notes: 互動所、職互動所與資工所合開，需使用進修部教室

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 深耕趨勢學理論，以生活型態資訊為基礎，探討社會趨勢與科技發展趨勢，做為商品企畫的基礎。本課程旨在引導學習者運用學術研究的工具，以科學的方法定義市場需求，並以理性的思維進行商品企畫。
description.en: Current theories and practices of trend study are covered, including trends of living style, fashion and technology development followed by product planning practice. The aims of this course is to put emphasis on conducting research approach in the process of scientific marketing management and reasonable product planning.

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解現行都市計畫法及相關法令體系的重要內容，同時針對實際案例予以檢討、分析。授課主題涵蓋：1.現行都市計畫法之法令體系、2.我國都市計畫法之發展沿革、3.都市計畫法的條文內容及相關問題、4.土地使用分區管制規則、5.營建法規電腦查詢系統之使用、6.未來都市計畫法修法之方向、7.都市計畫法規施行案例分析。

notes: 四建四與四創意四合開(建築)

description.zh: 1.建築管理行政體系及法源介紹。2.建築管理之對象人、事、物介紹。3.建築許可之申請、審核、核發、列管及追蹤作業。4.建築物之施工管理及工程糾紛處理。5.建築物使用與變更使用之管理。6.建築物昇降設備管理制度介紹。7.建築物違章之查報與拆除。8.建築物公共安全檢查法律依據及作業程序。9.建築管理的發展方向。10.建築師及營造業管理之基本概念及未來之工作方向。
description.en: 1.	Introducing the hierarchical of building department and government administration rules of the building.2.	Introducing administrative terms of building with owner, designer or supervisor of building, construction work, building site, and building itself.3.	Application procedure for a building permit, include application, judgement, approbation, management and audit.4.	Administration for Building construction and construction dispute intermediation.5.	Administration for building occupancy and alterations.6.	Introducing administration of building elevator facilities.7.	Illegal building administration and dismantling.8.	Inspection procedure for building safety and procedure rules.9.	The development direction of building administration.10.	The basic concept and executive direction in the future for administration of Architect and construction.

notes: 四建四與四創意四合開(建築)

description.zh: 訓練學生對室內施工圖樣,施工規範及施工實務之了解.並熟練室內工程之成本分析及數量計算之方法與要點.
description.en: This course will acquaint the student with the techniques of pricing a piece of furniture including materials, labor, overhead, and administrative expenses. To calculate "Break-even" Point, to analyze and control cost elements of manufacturing furniture, with special emphasis on economic utilization of materials, manpower and machines

notes: 四設三與四創意三合開(家室組)

description.zh: 生活空間設計實務與管理訓練。課程主旨在於培養學生對於室內設計實際工務執行與專案管理之能力，尤重： 1. 施工與估價, 2.室內設計技術規範兩大議題。其中，施工與估價部分強調設計者對於室內設計工程管理之了解，並熟練室內工程之成本分析及數量計算之方法與要點。室內設計技術規範部分則強調設計者應有的對於室內裝修設計與工程相關法規的掌握，如：建築法(與室內裝修有關的部份)、建築技術規則(與室內裝修有關的部份)、建築物室內裝修管理辦法(最主要的)、公寓大廈管理辦法、消防法、勞工安全衛生管理辦法、各類場所消防安全設備設置標準、公共工程品質管理辦法、營造業法、廢棄物清潔管理辦法等。
description.en: Training in the management and the practice of an interior design project. The course aims to equip students with the competence of managing a design project from ideality to reality that stresses especially two sections: 1. the construction and the estimation, and 2. the codes and regulations for the practice of an interior design project. The first section aims to acquaint the student with the management skill of construction, and the techniques of pricing the project including materials, labor, overhead and the administrative expenses. The second section is to enable students to understand and apply the codes and regulations for interior decoration and construction. For example, Building Code (the articles concerning interior decoration), Building Technical Regulations(the articles concerning interior decoration), Regulations for the Management of Building Interior Decoration and Repairs(the primary), Apartment Building Regulations, Fire Act, Labor Safety and Health Law, Standard fo

notes: 四設三四與四創意三四合開(家室組)

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

notes: 四設三四與四創意三四合開(第5週起秦自強)

description.zh: 細部設計之任務是接續基本設計之工作，以較大之比例圖說表達設計者之設計概念，其中包含材料之經驗型知識及其應用。教學上透過理論傳授以及對各種材料之特性體驗、繪製圖說、施作，以達教學目的。
description.en: The task of Detail Design is to extend the design concept of basic design in larger scale. It includes the empirical knowledge of materials and their applications. Through theory delivery and acquaintances of all kind of materials, design drawing    and practice to reach the teaching goal.

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討敷地計畫的規劃及設計技術如何應用於實際的操作層面。以敷地計畫的基本內容為單元，介紹各種實際案例並分析其特點。學生透過課堂的討論及實地的調查、分析，來瞭解敷地計畫的實際工作內容並研習各種課題的對策、解決方法，使其具備更豐富的專業知識應用於建築設計的相關領域。
description.en: The course is to explore the practical skills on site planning techniques. The course covers the basic components and their various applications of the site planning. Both advantages and disadvantages of each application are introduced. Through class discussions and field studies, students are able to understand the actual contents and issues of the site planning. The strategies and solutions to the planning problems will be facilitated to help students to get the better professional abilities of related architectural design works.

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 本課程訓練運用數位科技能力，以進行建築領域中的複雜幾何設計形體的發展、描述、資訊擷取，並透過系統化流程加以合理化，以至建造完成。本課程授課方式為演講及實作並行，課程預期修課者發展出一套有創意的數位構築系統。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in digital technologies for extracting, developing, and analyzing data of complex geometries, while facilitating production of a systematic workflow for rationalization and constructability. The course will be conducted in the forms of lectures and tutorials, and expects students to develop unique and creative systems of digital fabrication.

notes: 四建三與四創意三合開(建築)

description.zh: 基礎室內設計工程圖學訓練。內容包含室內空間三視圖繪製原理，標準符號、線條、尺寸、字型等標示；空間一點、兩點投影透視，以及實例練習。課程主要以手繪為訓練基礎。
description.en: The training of fundamental interior architectural drawing with lectures consists of Three-view drawing and the marking of standardized symbols, lines, dimension and types. It consists also the training of Perspective drawing based on Projection theory. The course emphasizes the practice of hand-drawing techniques.

notes: 四設二與四創意二合開(限主修家室組修課)

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

notes: 資源所與職資源所合開

description.zh: 電化學的領域包羅萬象，舉凡電泳作用與腐蝕現象的探討，電分析感測器或電池元件的製作，以及電鍍、拋光或鋁和氯氣的生產技術等均為電化學工程的範疇。本課程除了講述基本的電化學原理外，將著重於電化學分析方法在化學系統研究上的應用。
description.en: The field of electrochemistry includes many different phenomena (e.g., electrophoresis and corrosion), devices (electro analytical sensors and batteries), and technologies (the electroplating of metals and the large-scale production of aluminum and chlorine). In addition to an overview of the basic principles of electrochemistry, the main emphasis here is on the application of electrochemical methods to the study of chemical systems.

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

name.zh: 時間序列分析與製程控制
name.en: Time Series Analysis and Process Adjustment

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於教導學生如何利用時間序列分析、品質製程管制、工程製程控制等方法來達成先進製程控制的目的。課程講述之內容包含下列課題:製程監控、製程調整、離散動態製程、時間序列模型、轉換方程模型、最佳回饋控制器、指數加權移動平均控制、遞迴式估計與自適應控制等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students a modern treatment of discrete-time advanced process control (APC) methods based on time series analysis, statistical process control (SPC) and engineering process control (EPC) for Quality Engineering in manufacturing. The topics that will be addressed in this course include:(1)	Process Monitoring; (2)	Process Adjustment;(3)	Discrete-Time Dynamical Processes; (4)	ARIMA Time Series Models; (5)	Transfer Function Modeling; (6)	Optimal Feedback Controllers; (7)	EWMA Control; (8)	Recursive Estimation and Adaptive Control.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 本課程以逐步口譯為主﹐深入模擬商務訪談﹐會議溝通﹐外賓接待至國際會議主持﹐隨行口譯﹐各式談判之概論與實例解說。課程注重模擬﹐演練及禮儀文化的涵養，以期訓練學生語言應對的能力及良好風度的表現。
description.en: This course focuses on Consecutive Interpretation. It simulates a commercial meeting and communication, visitors reception, international conference hosting and escort interpretation. In addition, it includes a general theory of different negotiations and examples. The course concentrates on simulation, practicum and courtesy cultivation. We expect to build up students' dialogue ability and manners.

name.en: Skills and Practicum of Escorting English

description.zh: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
description.en: This course provides an application of Interpretation for different occasions. These situations include a factory visit, an exhibition presentation, an opening address, a foreign-visitors reception and a banquet attendance. This course aims to build up the techniques and cultivation of Escort Interpretation through intensive oral training.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 商業與科技的日新月異乃現代生活之重要標的，本課程選讀書報雜誌中有關經貿企管等商業論述，以及科技資訊等相關文章，以討論方式，引導學生進入現代工商科技化的英語環境。
description.en: This course will guide students to read articles on technology and business from a variety of sources (books, magazines, newspapers, television scripts, etc.)  Students are required to actively participate in the speaking activities in the classroom which may involve group discussion and oral presentation of a specific topic.

description.zh: 培養正確的英語發音與腔調，並訓練學生熟悉如何使用音標記錄發音以及辨認學習者在英語發音中經常發生的問題。  課程中也介紹英語語音系統的主要規則。
description.en: This course will be concerned with English speech sounds and stress patterns, the use of phonetic symbols for transcribing pronunciation and identifying pronunciation problems. The general principles of English phonology will be introduced.

name.zh: 高階英文字彙習得與應用
name.en: The Acquisition and Application of Advanced English Lexical Use

description.zh: 此課程旨在協助學生建立相當於美國大學入學測驗的高階字彙，亦即相當於接受高等教育之英語系國家人士所具備的用字能力。此課程將通過故事方式介紹此類字彙，其中也包括字形學之解析。學生修習此課程後應能將高階字彙使用於正確的上下文中，因此可達成下列諸目的："	提昇高階字彙數量"	加強英文閱讀能力"	習得重要字源解析"	避免上下文中的用字錯誤"	提高英語表達能力"	加強英文寫作能力"	精進英語文溝通技巧
description.en: This course aims to help students build a more powerful vocabulary on the SAT (the qualifying exam for US college admission) level, i.e. the level of proficiency of an educated native speaker's. Students will be introduced to the lexical use through story scenes. Morphological analysis of the words will be included in the course. At the exit of this course, students are expected to use them in their proper contexts and hence reach the following goals:"	Develop a powerful vocabulary"	Improve reading skills"	Learn important word roots"	Avoid word usage error in context"	Become a better speaker"	Strengthen his/her writing ability"	Improve communication skills

name.zh: 中英對比分析應用研究

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討英語與漢語在結構與功能上的主要異同，涵蓋語意、語音、音韻、詞法、句法、語用與社會文化等特徵，同時類比與對比這兩個語言使用何種語言策略達到溝通的目的。本課程之本質在訓練學生往後如何解決語言對比分析的問題，在學期結束時，學生需要針對英語與漢語某一特定語言現象獨立完成對比分析。
description.en: This course aims at investigating the major structural and functional differences and similarities of Chinese and English. The differences and similarities identified include semantic, phonetic, phonological, morphological, syntactic, pragmatic, and sociocultural features. We will also compare and contrast linguistic strategies the two languages employ to achieve communicative purposes. This course is exploratory in itself, directed toward providing students with keys to tackling linguistic issues they may encounter in their future careers. Students will be required to present an ultimate Chinese-English contrastive analysis in a certain aspect at the end of this course.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉中西方翻譯理論的重要概念與原則，並將理論知識運用於各種文體的英漢與漢英實務翻譯上。學生將對翻譯理論深入探討，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of translation theories, both Chinese and Western. It will also assist students in applying their theoretical knowledge to practical English <-> Chinese translations of various types. Its aim is to help students to discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討多輸入多輸出系統(MIMO)其系統行為之描述，內容包括MIMO系統之穩定性分析、觀察性分析及其控制器設計，並探討MIMO系統的物理觀念及其數學描述的各種方法，是線性系統之進階課程，適合碩士班以上之學生學習。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to explore the behaviors of multivariable systems. The contents includes: stability analysis, observability analysis, and controller designs for MIMO linear systems. Besides, we will introduce the physical concept of MMIO linear systems and various methods of describing MIMO linear systems via mathematical model. This is an advanced course to linear system theory, and is especially for graduate students.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。
description.en: main -machine Interface (MMI)1.Introduction to automation 2.Perosn computer Interface 3.Platform of main machine interface :Windows operation system. 4.Windows Application program Interface :DLL,DDE and active X program design.5. Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

description.zh: 簡介，人工智慧語言介紹及工業應用，專家系統。
description.en: Introduction, Artificial Intelligence, programing language and its industrial application, expert system.

name.zh: 財經專業證照進階講座
name.en: Advance Seminar of Finance and Economic Professional Certification

description.zh: 為加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本「財經專業證照進階講座」課程，針對『金融市場常識與職業道德』與『理財規劃人員』，希望學生能夠學習基本的金融市場常識與金融從業人員應具備的職業道德，並進一步瞭解理財的流程，同時就個人或家庭的收支、儲蓄、住屋、子女教育、以及退休生活等規劃皆予明確分析，並舉實際案例詳予說明並闡釋各種相關理財金融機構之角色與功能，逐一介紹各類理財工具之特性及其有效之運用方法。對於未來有志從事金融機構財富管理業務之從業人員及大專院校財金系所學生，極適合作為其日常業務之參考、進修或準備應試之用。以培育學生參加並通過國內外財經專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the advance seminar of professional licenses in finance and economics, nurture students to participate in professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate finance and economics professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 四資財二與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解多國企業所面對的國際財務管理的議題、其理論及實務。內容包括外匯市場、國際套利、外匯衍生性商品、外匯風險暴露管理、境外市場及國際投資組合管理。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the theory and practice of the international financial management issues faced by multinational corporations. The course includes the following topics: foreign exchange, foreign exchange arbitrage, foreign exchange derivatives, risk exposure management, offshore market, and the international portfolio management.

description.zh: 「生命科學與工程」課程融合生物與工程兩門學科，內容涵蓋生命科學領域（分子、細胞、組織、器官、系統、個體、行為等）及工程領域（化學、化工、材料、電子、電機、機械、土木等，以及影像、量測、模式等方法）。授課內容盡量以引發學生興趣為主，目的在使工程領域的學生能明白生命科學對工程設計的影響，以及使生物領域的學生能瞭解工程對於生命科學的幫助；兩者相輔相成，相互影響。
description.en: This course is designed for undergraduate engineering students with the objective of introducing the fundamentals of life sciences while pointing out the areas in which engineering plays a pivotal role in the advent. Students are to be provided with perspectives on the interplay between biology, engineering, and biotechnology, with emphasis on the quantitative and integrative nature of biological and bioengineering problems. The contributions of engineering to life science are illustrated with the design and manufacturing of tools essential for observations and applications in medicine, agriculture and environment.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹給水之淨化以及廢水之處理，以應當前之需要，其內容包括水質概述，用水標準，淨水工程，污水處理，污水特性，水體白淨，物理、化學及生物處理方法，污泥處理，回收利用等學理與實務並重，使學者對水及廢水處理問題有一基本暸解，進而可應用於特殊用水及廢水處理。
description.en: An introduction to the purification of drinking water and waste water treatment. Lectures include water quality, water purification engineering, waste water characterization and treatment, chemical, physical and biological methods for waste water treatment.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 介紹高分子物理、化學及光電等性質，並且回顧及展望高分子在生化、醫學及光電產業的應用。1. 高分子物理及化學性質2. 高分子光電特性3. 功能性高分子4. 液晶高分子5. 薄膜技術與應用6. 生醫材料及高分子藥物7. 高分子導體及半導體8. 光電用高分子9. 高分子電池10. 高分子LED
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles and applications of polymers. It covers the following topics: physical and chemical properties; electrical and optical characterizations; functional polymers; liquid crystalline polymers; membranes; biomaterials; polymers for photonic and electronics; conductive and semi-conductive polymers; polymers for batteries; and polymeric LED.

notes: 四化三甲乙丙合開，限20人

description.zh: 依藥理作用上之分類，介紹其名稱( 包括處方常用名稱) ，化學結構，性狀，合成方法，藥物代謝( 吸收，循環路徑及作用器官或組織) ，藥理反應，適合之醫療症狀使用劑量，中毒及解毒劑，配合禁忌等。
description.en: This course describes the classification of the medicinesincluding their trade names, or those generally prescribed; the chemical structure and their related characteristics; methodology of sythesis and preparation; fate of drugs (involving absorption, circulation and their target organs or tissues); pharmacological aspects; method of indications; intoxication and detoxication as well as their incompatability.

notes: 四化三甲乙丙合開，初選限30人

description.zh: 所謂再生醫學主要是利用健康細胞來製作具有功能與生命性之身體器官組織，用於修復或是替換身體內，因為老化、生病、受損所造成之不健康的器官與組織。其次，亦可以其他的方式，例如利用體內藥物釋放等方式來刺激體內組織或是器官再生之方法。其所涉及的領域廣泛至所有之醫療方式。內容將主要以幹細胞與組織工程學為基礎，因應臨床醫療需要為導向，結合材料工程、細胞生物學以及基因工程等科學探討此一應用科學。本課程內容將以深入淺出方式討論醫療相關的尖端技術及未來發展之趨勢。同時，結合幹細胞、組織工程與再生醫學之基本概念知識介紹許多再生醫療相關生技產品。
description.en: Regenerative medicine refers to the use of healthy cells to produce the functioning of the organs or tissues, and repair or replaces the aged and damaged organs or tissues. In addition, it can also be applied directly to in vivo models, for example, to stimulate the tissue or organ regeneration by drug release. Regenerative medicines cover a wide range of medical care. In this course, we will mainly focus on stem cells and tissue engineering based on clinical needs –oriented, we combine materials engineering, cell biology, genetic engineering and other related knowledge explore this issue. Meanwhile, the course will also introduce the knowledge of stem cells, the basic concepts of tissue engineering and many regenerative medical-related biotechnology products.

notes: 四化三甲乙丙合開,初選限30人

name.zh: 細胞生理反應之檢測原理與技術
name.en: Principles and Techniques to Test Cell physiology

description.zh: 本課程設計著重於實務操作與原理之探討，並藉由結果現象之觀察來使學生了解人體生理及醫學現象。主軸包括(1)檢視細胞之代謝與生長表現:細胞之生長好與壞可由其代謝途徑與生長速度判斷。本課程將把細胞培養在不同環境下，觀察並定量其代謝活性、生長速度及代謝產物。 (2)細胞形態之定性觀察:不同組織之內部細胞，其形態不一。本課程將介紹以不同物理/化學之方法來觀察細胞形態，使學生熟悉不同生理組織中細胞之形態之差異及其與其組織生理特性之關聯。學期中將邀請校外學者及業界人士演講此些技術在業界與學術界之應用及實務性。本課程之分類大綱如下:1.   細胞代謝與細胞活性+實驗 (測細胞活性)2.   探討細胞生長因素+實驗 (計算細胞數目)3.   蛋白質與DNA在細胞中的角色+實驗(定量DNA)4.  細胞之代謝中間與最終產物(RNA與蛋白質) +實驗(定量細胞產物與ELISA原理)5.    不同生理組織之特性+實驗(細胞外觀觀察(螢光染色))6. 細胞外觀與生理特性之關聯+實驗(細胞外觀觀察(切片染色))7.    生醫材料與細胞組織交互作用之實例探
description.en: This course focuses on hands-on training of basic cell laboratory skills. The purpose is to help students understand cell physiology. The main curriculum contains 1. measuring cell growth and metabolism; 2. observing cell morphology. There will also be speakers from the industry and academic institutes to talk about more specific applications.The class contains the following topics:1.	Cell metabolism and viability (Experiment: measure cell viability)2.	Cell growth (Experiment: Cell counting)3.	Proteins and DNA (Experiment: DNA quantification)4.	Cell intermediate and final products (Experiment: quantification of cellular products and ELISA)5.	Tissue physiology (Experiment: fluorescent stain of cells)6.	Cell morphology (Experiment: histological stain of cells)Cellular interactions with biomedical materials.

notes: 四化三甲乙丙合開,含實驗,限18人

description.zh: 選修介紹材料通性、分類與應用，並深入高分子生成之聚合反應、反應機構、反應動力學、熱力學、聚合物之材料構造、聚合方法、分子量之測定、分子量分佈以及一般檢測高分子特性之技術。
description.en: This course is concerned primarily with the synthesis, properties, and technology of synthetic polymers. Topics include polymerization, structure and properties, characterization , and properties of commercial polymers

description.zh: 選修介紹材料通性、分類與應用，並深入高分子生成之聚合反應、反應機構、反應動力學、熱力學、聚合物之材料構造、聚合方法、分子量之測定、分子量分佈以及一般檢測高分子特性之技術。
description.en: This course is concerned primarily with the synthesis, properties, and technology of synthetic polymers. Topics include polymerization, structure and properties, characterization , and properties of commercial polymers

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure, its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure, their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity, electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain , dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product, hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

notes: 四材三乙和四乙合開【停開】

description.zh: 1.機率簡介2.機率分佈3.統計概論4.抽樣分析5.參數估計6.區間估計7.假設檢定8.迴歸分佈9.統計品管10.變異分析
description.en: Introduction to probabilityProbability distributionIntroduction to statisticsSampling analysisQuality control

notes: (1週)四材三乙和四乙合開【停開】

description.zh: 工程地質學為地質科學之應用學門之一，本課程之內容在介紹工程地質的一般關念及基本原理，包括工程地質學導論、工程工址調查重點、工程地質中之材料因素、岩體中之弱面、地質作用的動力與岩石之褶皺、工程地質之計量化及其應用、工程地質在自然邊坡穩定之應用、各種自然岩石與土壤之簡介、工程地質在水庫工程之應用、工程地質在壩工之應用、工程地質在隧道工程之應用、工址調查之目的方法與程序、工程地質圖簡介、地質鑽探與現地試驗、工程地質中之環境因素等部份。
description.en: This course of Engineering Geology is designed as an upper-division course for undergraduate geology majors and graduate students, with an emphasis on construction or environmental concerns. Also enrolled are civil engineers with a background in geology and those who are interested in geologic applications to construction. The course builds on a basic knowledge of geology by relating geology to engineering fundamentals and construction concepts. The topics of this course include 1.Origin and development of the earth, 2.Introduction to the Engineering Geology, 3.Elements of Rock and Soil Mechanics, 4.Engineering properties of rocks, 5.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.The weak planes in the rock body, 7.The environmental factors of the Engineering Geology, 6.Geologic hazards, 7.The rock mass classification and rating, 8.Landslides, subsidence, and slope stability, 9.Site investigation, 10.Case study in the Engineering Geology

notes: 四材三乙和四乙合開【停開】

description.zh: 本學科對於再生、非再生資源以及資源再生之現象作一整體性的介紹，並配合原理及實例的講授，以期能對於工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的低價值物料，經由處理而加以回收利用，避免資源的浪費。
description.en: Introduction the recycle of resources.

description.zh: 利用化學方法進行地質探勘
description.en: ntroduction to geochemical exploration

description.zh: 本實習著重在材料的合成法，包含人工晶體及各式無機材料的合成實作。實驗設計皆搭配「材料合成」授課內容，所得之樣品將進一步做表面與結構上的分析。核心實驗計有： (1)固態反應法合成鈦酸鋇粉末 (2)化學氣相沈積法沈積薄膜材料 (3)沉澱法合成磁性氧化鐵粉末 (4)溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽粉末 (5) 溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽薄膜 (6)氧化還原法合成金奈米顆粒 (7) 磷酸二氫銨晶體成長 (8) 物理氣相沈積法沈積金薄膜材料
description.en: The laboratory sections in this course are designed to synthesize various inorganic materials. Eight experiments will be carried out in a semester including: 1. Synthesis of BaTiO3 powders by solid-state reaction 2. Preparation of thin film by chemical vapor deposition 3. Synthesis of magnetic Fe3O4 powders by precipitation reaction 4. Synthesis of SiO2 powders by sol-gel reaction 5. Synthesis of SiO2 thin film by sol-gel reaction 6. Synthesis of Au nanoparticles by oxidation-reduction reaction 7. Crystal growth of NH4H2PO4 8. Preparation of gold thin film by physical vapor deposition.

name.en: Intellectual Property Management for Global Brands

description.zh: 於高科技、知識經濟時代，作為無形資產之「全球品牌」，已成為促進公司價值及成長之引擎。此全球品牌大時代氛圍，「全球品牌」策略愈發重要。品牌策略管理在提供客戶認知、產品績效及企業價值。藉由品牌溝通，品牌創造客戶對品牌之熟悉及偏好，而達成商業管理目標，進而提昇股東價值及股價市值。本課程將就下列議題及知名品牌運作模式為說明：一、品牌發展策略，二、品牌價值，三、品牌商標保護策略(即1. 商標計畫，2. 商標執行，3. 商標控制）。四、公司治理與品牌管理。五、智財品牌授權。
description.en: In High-tech knowledge economy, as intangible assets "global brand", has become an engine for raising company value. During this global brand era, "global brand" strategy is important for enhancing customer awareness and business performance.  Through diversified brand communication, global brand creates customer familiarity and preference, and to achieve business goals, thereby enhancing shareholder value.The course focuses on the following topics: First, the brand development strategy, Second, brand value, Third, brand & trademark protection strategy. Fourth, corporate governance and brand management. .Fifth, intellectual property/brand licensing.

description.zh: 愈來愈多的商業活動在網路上進行，蓬勃發展的電子商務，也對現有的法律與政策造成許多挑戰。本課程將對電子商務的發展做一概要介紹，其後由網路科技與智財法律的概論談起，接著以目前智財法規所面臨的議題為主，並挑選台灣與國際的知名案例，讓學生兼顧理論與實務，建立對電子商務法規與政策發展的認識。
description.en: Doing business online is more and more prevalent nowadays, nonetheless, as e-commerce activities striving rapidly, new legal challenges are calling for attention. This course will start with an introduction on the characteristics and developments of e-commerce activities, following by the exploration and discussion on relevant literature and cases. Noted that this course will focus on the intellectual property laws and make comparative studies in order to equip students with an in-depth understanding and knowledge on these issues.

description.zh: 以案例解析為主的方式，探究我國著作權法的重要課題，藉以協助同學了解審判實務適用法律的依據、判準或論證等，並適時補充國外相關學理、判決及著名案例等，以增進同學對國內外相關重要著作權案例之思辨及評析的能力。
description.en: This is a course focused on case analyses, in studying important issues relating to Taiwanese Copyright Act. Graduate students joining this course may find help on comprehension of the basis, rules or argumentation to the laws applied in trial practice.  Together with timely supplementation of relevant foreign academic interpretations, adjudications and noted cases, students may improve their ability of contemplation and analysis on related and significant copyright cases home and abroad.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

notes: 智財所與職智財所合開

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長案。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the allowable subjects for patent, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 民法總則介紹民法中的共通概念與基本原則，為整部民法以及所有法律的學習基礎。透過民法總則之學習，同學可以熟悉法律的思考模式及規範架構。本課程將以理論與實務並重方式協助同學學習。
description.en: The General Principle of the Civil Law serves to introduce the common concept and fundamental principle of the Civil Law.  In short, the General Principle of the Civil Law predominates as a learning basis for the whole Civil Law and all legal study.  Through learning on the General Principle of the Civil Law, students can be familiar with the model of legal thought and the framework of norm.  This course aims to assist students learning from both theory and practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要關注台灣專利申請的程序觀點。其相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、發明人訪談、審查意見答覆寫作、訴願狀寫作和專利申請策略。此外，國際專利申請的實務觀點也會在課堂上討論以做為比較。本課程教材包括專利申請教科書、各國專利申請基準、和法院判決等。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspect of the patent prosecution in Taiwan. The topics cover inventorship, ownership (including a right to file a patent application), priority, formality, inventor interview, office action response drafting, petition brief drafting, and patent filing strategy.  In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented for comparison. The class materials include a patent prosecution textbook, patent examination guidelines from different counties, and court decisions.

description.zh: n
description.en: n

description.zh: 本課程主要講授重點包括刑事訴訟基本理念與原則、迴避與管轄、證據法則、以及刑事訴訟之程序與執行等，並將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於刑事訴訟法的瞭解。
description.en: This course focuses on the basic concept , disqualification, jurisdiction, evidence rule, and execution of the law of criminal procedure. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Law of Criminal Procedure for the students.

description.zh: 本課程講授英美契約法。其他資訊請參閱英文概述。
description.en: This course teaches basic rules of contract law applied in the United States. While contract law is a law of a state, this course does not focus on any specific jurisdiction. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

description.zh: 營業秘密法係為保障營業秘密，維護產業倫理與競爭秩序，調和社會公共利益，所特別制定之法律。該法所稱營業秘密係指方法、技術、製程、配方、程式、設計或其他可用於生產、銷售或經營之資訊，而符合左列要件者：一、非一般涉及該類資訊之人所知者。二、因其秘密性而具有實際或潛在之經濟價值者。三、所有人已採取合理之保密措施者。
description.en: Trade Secret Act is enacted to protect trade secrets, maintain industrial ethics and order in competition, and balance societal and public interests.The term "trade secret" as used in this Act shall mean any method, technique, process, formula, program, design, or other information that may be used in the course of production, sales, or operations, and also meet the following requirements:(1)It is not known to persons generally involved in the information of this type;(2)It has economic value, actual or potential, due to its secretive nature; and(3)Its owner has taken reasonable measures to maintain its secrecy.

notes: 科法學程與最後一哩合開，限25人

description.zh: 車輛空氣動力學理論基礎，車輛空氣動力學機構，空氣動力學，汽車空氣動力特性，卡車空氣動力特性，汽車空氣動力風阻與特性，汽車行駛安全與舒適，汽車行駛噪音與防治方法，及車輛空氣動力設計要點。
description.en: Introduction of automobile aerodynamics, Some aerodynamics fundamentals of fluids mechanics, Aerodynamic drag of passenger cars, Directional stability, Safety and comfort, Wind noise, Mechanisms of noise generation and transmission, Design features。

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

name.zh: 液氣壓混合動力車特論
name.en: Special Topics on Hydraulic and Pneumatic Hybrid Vehicle

description.zh: 傳統車輛卻往往因為間歇式行駛模式，最容易產生大量廢氣及油耗汙染。雖然純電動車具有高 效能與及低汙染的特性，但行駛距離的受限與電池價格昂貴。而油電混合車雖然可以達到環保節能的目的，但跟傳統車輛來比仍昂貴許多。液壓混合動力車仍以引擎作動，需要加速時與其他動力源交替使用，等液壓系統蓄能器用盡再回到傳統引擎運作，與泵浦馬達配合利用剎車產生的動力回收，此循環模式回收再利用，以達到節省耗油及降低污染功用，特論將討論其相關技術與理論。
description.en: The traditional vehicle is often in intermittent mode, most likely to produce a lot of pollution emissions and fuel consumption. Though an electric vehicle with high efficiency and low pollution characteristics, yet the range is limited and batteries are expensive. Hybrid cars can achieve the objective of environmental protection and energy saving, but they are still expensive compared to conventional vehicles. Hydraulic hybrid vehicles use engines and hydraulic motor/pump as alternate power source. The energy storage elements are high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators thanks.  With the aid of hydraulic motor/pump and high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators’ thanks, the brake-generated power recovery is achieved and reused in turn for acceleration. This special topic focus on the related technologies and theories.

notes: 車輛所與職車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹互動媒體設計與製作時所需要的資訊技術與應用程式。本課程的內容包含了解目前發展互動科技應用時可使用之應用程式與系統的概念、元件及操作原理的介紹。並透過基礎元件設計的應用與實作，培養學生透過應用程式與腳本語言程式的撰寫。有別於資訊相關科系程式設計的課程，本課程將發展包含程式應用概念介紹、程式撰寫邏輯思維訓練、以及互動程式撰寫的模組，學生可依自己的興趣以及投未來生涯規劃需求，選擇不頭的學習模組，以培養未來互動科技發展所需的跨領域專業知識。另本課程也結合業界的資源與師資，協助學生深入了解未來互動科技技術與程式應用的發展趨勢。
description.en: This course provides an introduction to the principles of information technologies and programming coding skills that can be used in interaction design element of the multimedia production process. Course activities are focused on programming coding skills training and the descriptions, contents, principles and applications of the changes to the digital technologies of interaction design and their future trends. This course encourages students to critically engage with interdisciplinary approaches to information technologies and interaction design in a context of peer support and feedback, in order to forge their own unique personal skills. These skills are then applied to a real-world design project in which students work with a project, with advice and input from industry professionals.

notes: 限本系生&上限人數18人修課

description.en: The objective of this course is multi-fold. First of all, it offers an unique opportunity to obtain comprehensive understanding about modern geoinformatics. In this course, students will be able to gain insights into the state-of-the-art research, development, and applications in geoinformatics, especially the 3S technologies (RS, GIS, GPS) and their integrations for sophisticated applications such as cyber city implementation and applications. For engineering students, this course is also an effective platform for capacity-building and career extending. The main topics of this course include: 1) Introduction (geoinformatics at a glance), 2) Remote Sensing (remote sensing fundamentals, airborne remote sensing, and satellite remote sensing), 3) Geographic Information Systems (GIS), 4) Global Positioning System (GPS), 5) Cyber City Implementation and Applications.

They are slurry diaphragm wall,pile foundation (reverse,or cased),anchor system, foundation excavation,drainage system,bracing system and monitoring system etc.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。

description.en: Stream ecological engineering method consists of restoring and protecting banks of streams, lakes, estuaries, and excavated channels against scour and erosion by using vegetative plantings, soilengineering, and structural systems.  The content of this course includes engineering surveys, estimating runoff, hydraulics, elementary soils engineering, structure, grassed waterways and outlets, gully treatment, diversions, stream and wetland restorations, construction and construction materials, and soil bioengineering for upland slope protection and erosion reduction.

description.zh: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業(Best Management Practice, BMP)之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。
description.en: Nonpoint source (NPS) pollution of streams, lakes, and estuaries has been a critical concern throughout the world.  The difficulty in both identifying and assessing nonpoint source pollution resides precisely in the complex nature of NPS.  This course aims to expose students to state-of-the-art tools and techniques for developing effective Best Management Practice (BMP) allocation plans to control NPS pollution at the watershed scale.  The foundations of this course will be focused on definition of NPS pollution, NPS pollutant dynamics in bioenvironmental systems, watershed hydrology and NPS pollutant transport, as well as BMPs for NPS pollution control.  Students will next learn how to apply Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), hydrologic modeling and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to the solutions of NPS pollution problems in watersheds.  The tools and techniques presented are flexible and students will be able to apply them to solve NPS type of proble

description.zh: 岩石工程是一門應用的課程，它的重點在於把基本的岩石力學的原理，運用在實際的工程問題上，因此，這門課將介紹岩石力學在岩石邊坡、岩石基礎、及岩石隧道上的應用。上課的學生在完成這門課之後，應該對這三大類的問題都有清楚的了解。為了使沒有上過岩石力學的學生也能進入狀況，這門課會先對岩體分類法（如RMR法及Q法）及立體投影圖加以回顧，然後再進行岩石邊坡工程、岩石基礎工程、及岩石隧道工程的介紹。「岩石工程」的課程大綱如下：
description.en: The focus of this course is the application of the basic principles of rock mechanics.  Three types of applications are to be covered in this semester-long course: rock slopes, rock foundations, and rock tunnels.  The students are expected to complete assignments in each of the above three categories.  To prepare students with no previous academic work in rock mechanics, this course will review the classification systems of rock masses (such as the RMR and the Q systems).  Also, the stereographic projection is a required tool, which will be introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程將探討明渠中穩定流、非穩定流、均勻流、非均勻流之流體特性。
description.en: Open channel hydraulics treats the motion of water in conduits that have a free surface, that is, in which the flow of water is not completely bounded by the channel perimeter and one surface is exposed to atmospheric pressure.  The flows can be steady (time-invariant) or unsteady, uniform (space-invariant) or non-uniform (gradually, rapidly, or spatially varied).  For engineers, open channels are very common for the conveyance of natural waters, storm discharges, sewage collection systems, and aqueducts for water distribution systems. Knowledge of the mechanics of open-channel flow, then, is important for the proper design of these facilities.

name.en: Disaster Prevention Planning and Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹有關災害發生的種類，以及相對應的災害預防規劃，並探討各種風險發生之機會，以進一步研擬危機緊急處計畫，以落實災害防治與減害的功效。
description.en: This course  will introduce the category, of disaster and each related preventing design.For deriving emergency treatment plan, the theory of rick management will be also discussed.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 應用定量分析法於水資源規劃與管理，並介紹系統分析、本益比之評估、多目標規劃與風險評估。
description.en: Quantitative analytical methods in water resources planning and management; introduction to systems analysis, benefit/cost, multi-objective planning and risk assessment.

description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 本課程係以營建工程管理之架構為主要核心，進階探討工程執行生命週期中之重點管理工作，並透過相關案例之研討，探討工程實務運作上之問題及管理對策。課程內容主要包含營建工程專案管理概念，營建管理方法，工程執行方式與管理策略，工程契約管理，工程爭議處理，工程界面管理等內容。

description.zh: 本課程主要結合環境工程與大地工程的觀點來介紹與有關環境保護的相關問題，主要的課題包括：固體廢棄物處理、封包及改善技術，並著重於固體廢棄物掩埋法之評估、覆蓋及阻絕技術所面臨之大地工程問題及後續受污染場址之處理及再利用等。此外學生以分組的方式並針對場址調查、設計與建造、土壤與地下水污染等問題進行討論，藉此培養學生充份了解此一專業課題所引發之大地工程問題，並介紹相關之處理技術，諸如：分析模式、地工合成材及土壤材料之應用、改善及處理成效、地表及滲出水之相關問題、液體及氣體之傳輸與回收、最終覆蓋及絕層之邊坡靜動態穩定及沉陷。同時訓練學生俱備將來畢業後在此一專業領域繼續發展的能力。
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	Geotechnical Engineering related to environmental issues. Topics include: solid waste disposal, waste containment, and remediation technologies. This course provides an understanding of the use of geotechnical concepts in the analysis and design of environmental systems. Focus is placed on the evaluation of waste containment facilities, covers relevant aspects of geotechnical and remediation technologies of contaminated sites. Besides, graduates may work as part of a team investigating, designing and constructing solutions to waste containment and soil and groundwater pollution problems. This subject prepares students for this work by developing an understanding of the engineering concepts and processes and also by introducing students to specialist techniques, such as contaminant transport modelling, geosynthetics and soil materials use in waste containment, remedial issues of solidification and stabilization, landfill and surface impoundment related des

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 本系在強調理論與實務並重的教學規劃中，隸屬建築技術體系的建築材料、構造、施工課程以五個學期分年循序漸進地建置。其中本課程為技術課程之最後一哩，整合前期授業內容之整合、亦屬工程案例之實務解析。本門課在十八週的進度規劃下，以三個子單元形成授業的主要架構:第一單元「建築生產」:主要從近年建築產業的趨勢，講解全球化、市場需求、國土戰略、城鄉變遷等因素下，對於建築業的衝擊與因應而生的技術發展內容；第二單元「建築細部設計技術」:從建築構法計畫的角度分析各種設計性能落實於細部時如何解決聲音、照明、熱傳、空氣、水等課題；第三單元「設計/施工技術案例」：實際以本校近期新建工程(精勤樓、誠樸樓、億光大樓)為例，結合校外協力專家進行專案案例之進程與技術管理要點之分享。
