name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.en: The Architecture and the Urban Microclimate

description.zh: 納入「都市微氣候」的考量，是現階段精進建築設計與提升建築效能的關鍵手段之一；回饋在生活舒適度的感受、居住安全度的維護以及省能節電度的落實等面相，都可得到具體且顯著的成效。掌握都市微氣候的特徵型態與變化脈動，擬判對建築安排可能肇致的影響及干擾，透過自然循環的流場機制及量場管制，找到本土建築規劃之最佳改善設計策略。
description.en: Bringing the “Urban Microclimate” into consideration is one of the key methods to enhance architectural design and upgrade building effectiveness at the present time; it can get feedbacks in many aspects such as feelings of cozy life, maintenance of residential safety , and to carry out the energy-saving.  Holding the features and changes of the Urban Microclimate, analyzing the potential affect and disturb for architecture, through the control mechanism of natural circulation in order to find the best strategy for local design enhancement.

name.en: The applications of TRIZ creative method

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行"系統化創新"是企業不可或缺的競爭策略及唯一的生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地應用。本課程以TRIZ創新方法為基礎，詳細的介紹系統性創新理論及實務的解題手法及落實創新方法之實務應用，可以很有系統地帶領學生們拓展革新思維，有效及系統化之應用於各種產業。讓學生也有機會應用於生活問題的解決。
description.en: Nowadays, enterprises in the phase of violating competence and decreasing profit. To make it survival, enterprises need to implement a systematic innovation technique, but only few companies really understanding and implement. The aim of this course is based on the applications of TRIZ creative method in detail which including the theory of systematic innovation and application, and also leading students to learn how the TRIZ works, and practice to solve their real life and various industries problems.

notes: 限大四和研究所(四工四甲乙、工管所與最後一哩合開)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生對於專案管理之主要原則與專案排程實務，並學習運用專案排程管理軟體工具。本課程探討專案管理與排程實務課題，包括專案之需求、經理、工作團隊、溝通、排程管理、預算、成本控制等，並學習專案排程管理軟體工具。
description.en: The course objective is to introduce students about key principles of project management and the use of project scheduling software.This course discusses the factors necessary for the successful project management.  Topics include project management concepts, needs identification, the project manager, teams, project organizations, project communications, project planning, scheduling, control and associated costs.  Project management software tools will be an integral part of the course.

notes: 四工三甲、四甲、工管所合開

description.zh: 於品質要求提升之情況下，自動化檢測系統成為現行產業界重要開發之工具之一，故本課程之目的在教授開法PC-based自動化檢測系統之基本知識與技能，主要在培養未來自動化檢測之開發技術人員。課程內容包括：3D CAD 繪圖設計、BCB程式介面之開發與設計、PC-based自動化控制、光學檢測之技術、e-Vision之使用、OpenCV之程式設計、基礎資料庫之應用、品質管制圖之原理及使用、及其他檢測相關技術等。
description.en: Quality has been one of the most important issues in currently manufacturing industry such that automated inspection system becomes a crucial tool.  Therefore, the objective of this course is to offer the basic knowledge and skill in developing a PC-based automated inspection system.  The content of this course includes: 3D CAD design, programming design using Borland C++ Builder, PC-based motion and I/O control, inspection design with e-Vision, basic programming design using OpenCV, database design, quality control chart, and related knowledge about inspection tools.

notes: 四工三甲乙與工管所合開(科研640室)

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的迅速發展，網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷通路以外的一個新興通路。再加上網路全年無休、成本低廉、以全球為市場的優勢，以及可符合消費者的需求的特色，使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流，因此國外廠商紛紛上網卡位，網路商業化已成為一股不可抵擋的趨勢。本課程中將介紹對電子商務作理論與實務上的探討。1. 電子商務與商業模式2. 電子商務策略發展3. B to C電子商務4. C to C電子商務5. B to B電子商務6. 無線網路7. 企業電子化8. 企業資源規劃9. 供應鏈管理10. 顧客關係管理11知識管理與e-Learning12. 網路行銷14. 網路廣告與關鍵字廣告15. 網路安全性
description.en: E-business (electronic business) is the conducting of business on the Internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners.The outline of electronic business is as following:1. Introduction to Electronic Commerce.2. Technology Infrastructure: The Internet and the World Wide Web.3. Selling on the Web: Revenue Models and Building a Web Presence.4. Marketing on the Web.5. Business-to-Business Online Strategies6. Online Auctions, Virtual Communities, and Web Portals.7. The Environment of Electronic Commerce: Legal, Ethical, and Tax Issues.8. Web Server Hardware and Software.9: Electronic Commerce Software.10. Electronic Commerce Security.11. Payment Systems for Electronic Commerce.12. Planning for Electronic Commerce

notes: 須先修過網路行銷實務,計網電腦教室

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

name.zh: 技職教育倫理專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on the Ethics of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 教學內容包含：學術倫理、教師專業倫理、學校行政倫理、校務研究倫理、評鑑倫理、資訊倫理與科技倫理、及其他新興倫理議題。課程實施方法以講解、專題演講、專題討論及情境問題解決為主。研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育領域倫理相關重要課題，挑選有興趣之子題提出簡報，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，並提出心得報告於課堂中研討，或撰寫探究議題之相關學術論述，以發展研究能力。
description.en: The contents of this course include: academic ethics, professional ethics for teachers , administrative ethics, institutional research ethics, evaluation ethics, information ethics and ethics in technology as well as other emerging issues on ethics.Lecturing, keynote speeches, seminars, and situation problem solutions are the means to be conducted in class. Students can report on sub-issues  in current ethics-related fields in technological and vocational education, investigating and implementing small-scale study, reviewing and proposing related topics, or writing academic papers, for the purpose to develop strong research skills and abilities.

name.zh: 技職教育政策理論與方法
name.en: Theoretical and Methodological Study on Policy of  VTE

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討技職教育政策之理論及方法，並期培養學生運用相關理論剖析技職教育議題。
description.en: The course focuses on discussing the theory and methodology of policy in vocational and technological education (VTE). Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 讓學生了解投資的基本觀念，課程內容主管要介紹證券(股票、債券)、期貨、選擇權的投資，以及證券的評價模式和CAPM等訂價模式說明。
description.en: The course helps stdents to understand the knowledge of investment. It includes security. Future option and CAPM Models.

notes: 經管所與管理外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方(歐洲及西亞)認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--自古埃及、西亞、而收至古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及17、18世紀的建築歷史。2.在思想上--自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3.在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。

notes: 四建一與四創意一合開(限主修建築系選課)

description.zh: 本課程係將個別半導體製造程序視為獨立單元，運用化工單元操作的概念，併同現有半導體產業與未來發展趨勢的分析介紹，再輔以積體電路元件的設計原理，期使具化工背景人員能從製程、設備、元件原理等各方面取得一對半導體製程的整合性觀念。課程內容：(1)產業概覽(2)積體電路基本技術背景(3)積體電路設計(4)積體電路製造(5)內連線RC延遲電路與放大電路(6)金屬化製程技術(7)平坦化製程技術(8)物理氣相沉積與化學氣相沉積技術(9)線層/阻障層/種晶層(10)金屬填充/金屬互連(0.5~0.18um)(11)銅製程整合(0.13um含以上)(12)基極/位元線路/電容器(13)積體電路製程相關設備
description.en: In this class, the specified semiconductor process is considered as specified unit. By use of the concepts which belong to the chemical engineering unit operations to interpret the analysis / introduction in semiconductor industry and future developing trending. (Also including the theories of VLSI devices) The students who have studied professional chemical engineering courses for many years, can acquire completed and integrated viewpoints in semiconductor process. (Including processes; apparatuses and theories of devices)1. Industry overview2. IC Fundamentals3. IC Design4. IC Fabrication5. Interconnect RC Delay  vs Scaling6. Metallization technology 7. Planarization technology8. PVD and CVD Technology 9. Liner/Barrier/Seed (0.5-0.18um)10. Metal Fill/ Metal Interconnect (0.5-0.18um)11. Cu Integration (0.13um and beyond)12. Gate/Bit Line/Capacitor13. IC Equipments

notes: 化工所與職化工所合開

description.zh: 選習本課程應具有普化及一般有機化學知識，此課程主要講授環境上（尤其是應用在工程上）有關的有機化學專業知識，其主要內容包括：１.有機物種與特性２.有機物之基本化學反應３.有毒（害）有機物之處理原理４.環境有機物之代謝與循環機制５.環境荷爾蒙之化性６.微量有機物之採樣分析原理
description.en: Based on general chemistry, the course provides professional knowledge on the organic chemistry in the environment. It includes the following major items：1.Characteristics and classification of organics.2.Fundamentals of chemical reaction for organics.3.Mechanics of cycling and metabolism of organics in the environment.4.Chemical properties of environmental Hollomans5.Theory of treatment for hazardous organics.6.Principle of sampling and analysis for micro-organics in the environment.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨在於加強學生對薄膜處理程序之深入了解，以作為進一步對水質管理應用之基礎。薄膜的種類介紹包括薄膜逆滲透、奈米薄膜、超過濾、微過濾、前驅滲透、電透析以及薄膜生物處理。基本理論包括薄膜前處理、質量傳輸、積垢、結構、薄膜阻塞及清理、後處理及實務應用。
description.en: This class will provide graduate student authoritative information on the current knowledge of membrane process for water treatment, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ultrafiltration, microfiltration, forward osmosis, electrodialysis and membrane bioreactor. The theories include pretreatment, mass transfer, fouling, scaling, membrane cleaning, post treatment and practical application.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

notes: 博班(綜科館第三演講廳)

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋數位時代中一手檔案史料的整理與數位化過程，著重檔案資料的典藏管理與加值應用。課程目標在於培養學生的檔案智能，包括：1. 認識檔案資料類型與特性，以及數位保存的相關概念；2. 理解檔案編排分類與描述著錄等資訊組織的基本原則3. 具備檔案資料查找、評估與運用數位典藏等檔案專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in modern archives administration. And then, focus on the long-term preservation and open access of digital archives. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts of archival materials relating to digital preservation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles of archives arrangement and information organization. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to find, evaluate and use the digital information.

description.zh: 1.廣告一定要花大錢嗎？那可不一定！我們一起找出不花大錢，又能廣而告知的好方法吧!2.讓學生了解各類型的廣告方式，不是只學美工而已。3.國內外各類別優良廣告觀摩後進行創意引導與實作4.每一小組就是一公司，我們從CI,LOGO和品牌故事開始做廣告
description.en: 1.Understand the various types of advertising methods, more than art design.2.Every team is a company, you should design the logo and brand story with brain storming. Through practical case studies, finding the way to sell creative.3.Watching and doing, learning more about advertising tools and use them.

description.zh: 學習Music Maker 16軟體的功能操作，並引導學生使用軟體加上課堂上教授的編曲要素、MIDI輸入、合成器的使用及混音技巧…等，融會貫通製作出自己的第一首歌。
description.en: To learn “Music Maker 16” functional operation, and to guide students working software on arranger elements, MIDI input, and the use of synthesizers and mixing skills. We expect students can produce their first song by performing music maker.

notes: 計網電腦教室，限40人(中午開始上課)

description.zh: 課程主要為探討插畫意涵與設計相關表現形式。透過對物象的觀察，開發創作與設計的資源。練習插畫技法（色鉛筆，水彩，壓克力，拼貼，與軟體組合），並結合現代設計理念，發展創新的文創設計風格。熟悉媒材的表現方式與技巧，並能實驗於文創設計中。
description.en: This course mainly explores the illustrator implications associated with the design manifestations. Through observe the images, the learner can develop the creative and design resources. The learner can exercise the illustration techniques (color pencil, watercolor, acrylic, collage, and software combination); combine with modern design, the development of innovative cultural and creative design. At last, the learner will be familiar to the illustrator expressions and skills in order to develop a new experiment in cultural and creative design.

description.zh: 土的文化特質幾乎沒有國界與語言之分，二次戰後，在美國以彼德、沃克斯（Peter Voulkos）為首的陶藝運動，引發容器美學的爭辯，日本走泥社（Sodeisha Group）以純粹造型的革命興起前衛陶藝，這兩股新興的藝術風潮，藉由教育，展演，競賽，工作營及個人工作室的發達，先後為台灣的陶藝創作環境，注入新的訊息，透過本課程對世界當代陶藝發展的檢視，引導同學思考台灣如何在當代找尋到自我的文化認同，以及思索土這項媒材所面臨的定位問題。
description.en: The development of Contemporary ceramics after World War II is affected by different territories, cultures and histories. Peter Voulkos was one of the leading artists who proposed abstract ceramics movement and vessel aesthetics issues in America. At the same time, in Japan, Sodeisha presented works as ceramics sculpture; the idea of ceramics was shifted from functional to sculptural works. However, people who studied overseas and then brought Eastern and Western ideas to home represented the ceramic art in Taiwan during 1980’s. They delivered their concepts and presented their works through schools, exhibitions, competitions, workshops and private studios. Today, Taiwanese contemporary ceramics was generally derived from these backgrounds and looking for our own cultural identity.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業（工業）相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1. The characters of business laws. 2. The presentment of civil code. 3. The business registration laws and business laws. 4. The insurance laws.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程將包括中國專利法與其相關法規，尤其將著重於中國的專利申請的審查規範，故將以中國知識產權局所頒布的專利審查指南為藍本，內容將包括中國可授予的專利標的、專利的核准要件、專利請求項的撰寫與解讀、專利侵權與救濟，以及中國知識產權局或其法院相關專利案件。
description.en: The class survey Chinese patent laws, with an emphasis on the Patent Examination Guidelines promulgated by the State Intellectual Property Office (SIPO). The structure follows the basic contents of patent eligibility, patent validity, patent infringement, appeal, as well as some patent cases decided by the SIPO or Chinese courts.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程以講述物理化學上，尤其是量子化學上，必須用到的數學為主。內容主要涵蓋三大部分。第一部分為基本線性代數，包含向量，矩陣，以及行列式等，第二部分為特殊函數與傅立葉轉換，第三部分則應用數值分析。
description.en: This course is mainly focus on the mathematics for physical chemistry, especially for quantum chemistry. It is divided into three parts. The first part is related to the linear algebra, such as vector, matrix, determinants, eigenvalues, diagonalization, and so on. The 2nd one is special function and Fourier analysis, including series solutions for differential equations, Hermite polynomials, Laguerre polynomials, Legendre polynomials, and Fourier transformation. The last one is related to the numerical analysis which is including Boltzmann distribution, Gaussian distribution, least square analysis.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 本課程被設計為介紹有關棉細紗、毛系紗、加工絲及複合紗製造系統，與其有關之細節亦被包括在內，其課程包含有製造流程、紡紗設備之機構與終端用途。此外，本課程被架構在朝向新式紡紗製造方法，製程管制與品質管制之新近發展，電腦控制系統與自動測試系統。纖維與成紗結構和性質間之相互關係及檢測亦被討論。
description.en: The course is designed to introduce in staple, filament and composite yarns manufacturing systems, which include manufacturing process, spinning mechanism and end applications. Furthermore, the course is structured towards an advanced study of the newer methods of yarn manufacture, and the latest developments in processing control and quality control, computerized control systems and automatic measuring systems. Relationships between fiber and yarn structural properties are also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 操作與高分子物理相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in polymer physics.

description.zh: 就主要的染料和顏料之化學結構、製造方式和基本化性予以闡述，以便對色料的相關應用有較為明晰的瞭解。
description.en: Chemical structure, manufacturing and properties of main dyes and pigments are studied. Further applications of the colourstuff are explained.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

description.zh: 染顏料(色料)雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research. This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 本課程針對紡織產業創新技術議題與實務操作，安排演講及工廠參訪實習，邀請跨領域之企業講師進行紡織工業技術演講，包括機能性纖維研發與應用、環保染整助劑、功能性織物、高強力纖維織物及塑膠回收再生製品開發等相關創新技術進行講演。除了課程中安排學生到相關紡織產業工廠實地見習。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of textile industries in the new millennium. This course will invite well-known entrepreneurs and experts to share their success stories and new technology with the students.

notes: 四分三四與最後一哩合開，有2場參訪活動

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

name.zh: 電動車與冷凍空調系統之微處理器
name.en: Application of microprocessor on electrical vehicle and refrigerator air-conditioning system

description.zh: 本課程是應用電子學進階課程。主要重點在教授微處理器應用於電動車與冷凍空調系統，並強調以實務練習及範例設計為主的方式。本課程介紹 CANbus系統 ，使用Freescale開發的嵌入式實驗開發平台，介紹微處理器電路設計最重要的觀念，以及 ARM晶片架構與系統程式等相關重點。
description.en: This course is the advanced electronics. The main goal is to introduce the application of microelectronics on the electric vehicle and refrigerator, air conditioning system. The lectures will focus on the practice and example design. The contents include two parts. First one is the introduction of Controller Area Network (CAN, or CANbus).   Second one is the introduction of the microelectronics circuits. All the application and circuits design will be practiced on the developing board of Freescale Company.

notes: 四能四與四車四合開(合開 待聘老師時數2)

description.zh: 空調設計基礎、空調冷暖負載計算、空氣線圖應用分析、主要設備規範擬定、空調系統規劃與設備選用分析、風管工程設計、水配管工程設計、設備配置與裝設工程、材料與成本分析、節約省能規劃設計。
description.en: Fundamentals of HVAC system design, cooling/ heating load estimation, analysis of applied psychometrics charts, schematic design of HVAC system, main equipment selection, main equipment specification, air duct & water piping system design, equipments layout & installation, materials & cost analysis. HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to:1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an    examine their economic and technical characteristics.2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator    PV systems, and discuss their operation.3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show    its feasibility and future   potential.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

name.zh: 車輛電力轉換系統實驗

description.zh: 本課程內容包含應用於車輛電能轉換系統的轉換器工作原理以及實驗平台建立。此外，針對新能源與車輛電力整合，本課程探討燃料電池、光伏電池、超級電容器以及先進電力電子轉換器與電動機驅動技術於車輛電力系統應用。而車輛電力系統中直流和交流配電架構的合理設計準則，也一併討論及分析。最後，針對電動車輛與智慧微電網系統整合的科技潮流，未來電動車電力系統將需要設計Vehicle-to-Grid(V2G)協助穩定電網或Vehicle-to-House(V2H)成為家用不斷電裝置系統。因此，本課程擬講授各種新型電力轉換器及電池充電器，並將其區分為隔離型/非隔離型、單向/雙向電力潮流特性之轉換器及其設計實例。
description.en: The contents of this course explore the operation principles and experimental bench setup of different converter topologies for vehicle electric conversion systems. Also, the course discuss new clean energies such as fuel cells, photovoltaic cells, super-capacitors integrated with advanced power electronic converters, and motor drive technology for the vehicle electric conversion applications. DC and AC power distribution architecture of the vehicle electric conversion system also be discussed and analyzed. Finally, corresponding to the trends of electric vehicles integrated smart micro-grid system technology; the electric vehicle power system needs the Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G) function to stabilize the grid or Vehicle-to-House (V2H) function used for household uninterruptible power device system applications. Therefore, this course will teach a variety of new power converters and battery charger with classifications of isolated / non-isolated, unidirectional / bidirectional power flow fe

name.zh: 嵌入式即時多工核心開發與應用
name.en: The Development and Application of Embedded Multitasking Real-time Kernel

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式即時多工核心，瞭解其架構，並學習嵌入式即時多工核心之設計與相關應用技術。內容包含：(1)嵌入式系統介紹，(2)即時多工系統觀念介紹，(3)即時多工核心運作方式，(4)工作管理，(5)時間管理，(6)記憶體管理，(7)事件管理，(8)於嵌入式系統建制即時多工核心。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded multitasking real-time kernel.  They will parse the structure of multitasking real-time kernel; learn the skill to design the embedded multitasking real-time kernel and the application technology.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded system introduction, (2)Multitasking real-time concept, (3)Kernel structure, (4)Task management, (5) Time management, (6)Memory management, (7) Event management, (8)Real-Time kernel porting.

description.zh: N
description.en: Piles of literature indicated that technology have been the main source of wealth creation of nations and that of competitive advantage of firms, with a special attention on semiconductor sector and system-on-chip technology. Moreover, technology has also become more complex, uncertain and expensive than ever before. Along with rapid technological change, it is imperative for firms to manage technology in an active and integrated way in order to survive and compete in the increasingly globalized markets. Drawn upon theoretical articles and empirical case study, the course aims to provide a comprehensive understanding of Management of Technology (MOT) with both micro (technology and firm) level and macro (secot and policy) level.

name.zh: 都市與建築的歷史性分析
name.en: Analysis on Historicity of Cities and Architecture

description.zh: 每個城市有其生長的脈絡與痕跡，即使歷史的命運與文化的特質使得某些城市有近似的發展面貌，但是就如同人類一般，沒有城市的面貌是相同的。本課程將從聚落或是城市發展的歷程，閱讀城市空間的特質。學習從城市的地理環境、街道與街廓的形態，以及從不同年代的建築類型、立面形式、甚至構造材料等等，亦即從都市紋理的演變，進行一座城市的歷史解讀。無論是經過計畫、呈現幾何性很強的城市，或是經由自然成長、具有有機發展痕跡的城市，均為本課程所探討的對象。而一座具有歷史的建築的生命歷程，亦會與城市一般，有其不同階段的生命歷程。這個建築的生命歷程，則反映在建築的各個元素與部位上。建築體的歷史，則更細膩地表現在建築的細部上，由空間形式、建築構成、結構、材料、構件組合方式、裝飾、裝飾匠師匠藝等等，藉由上述內容解讀建築的生命歷程，從而建立建築的生命年表，而可用於建築物歷史與價值的判定。上述的城市抑或是建築的共時性或歷時性的歷史性分析，均從類型學與形態學著手，建立一套歷史系譜。
description.en: Every city has its own historic context and traces, even though the historical fate and cultural characteristic shape some similar aspects of some cities. But, just like the look of human being, people look alike, but no one looks the same (except for twins). It doesn’t exist two identical cities. We would like to observe how a settlement or a city develops from its origin, and to read the characteristic of its space. We also try to learn to understand a city from its geographical environment, forms of streets and blocks, architectural types of diverse ages, styles of facades and even the constructive materials, etc., that is, from the development of its urban fabrics, to decode its spaces. No matter if those cities were planned with strong geometrical character, or expanded gradually with organic forms, we would study them in this seminar.Just as what we just describe on a city, one building or a group of buildings has their life history to be browsed. Different from a city, the

description.zh: 本課程介紹超文本標記語言(HTML)語法與層疊樣式表(CSS)之應用。課程內容包括：1. 超文本標記語言 2. 層疊樣式表 3. JavaScript 直譯式腳本語言 4. HTML5 APIs 語法 5. CSS3 特徵 6. DOM 文件物件模型 7. JQuery 函式庫 8. JSON 資訊交換語言 9. AJAX 非同步傳輸 10. SVG 可縮放向量圖形 11. HTML5 Canvas 應用程式介面 12. WebGL 三維繪圖 13. 自調式網頁設計 14. Bootstrap 15. 網頁文字編排學 16. 網頁字型。
description.en: This course introduces HyperText Markup Language (HTML) and Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). The course topics include: 1. HTML syntax, 2. CSS syntax, 3. JavaScript, 4. HTML5 APIs syntactic features, 5. CSS3 features, 6. Document Object Model (DOM), 7. jQuery library, 8. JavaScript Object Notation (JSON), 9. Asynchronous JavaScript and XML (AJAX), 10. Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), 11. HTML5 Canvas API 12. WebGL, 13. Responsive Web Design (RWD), 14. Bootstrap, 15. Web Typography, 16 Web Fonts.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 四資二與四電資二合開

name.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局
name.en: Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping

description.zh: 產業策略規劃與技術布局課程旨在教育學生對高科技、傳統與服務產業之屬性深入了解與培養策略規劃之核心能力，並且藉由跨領域實作課程中，學習技術布局流程，以培養科技大學學生進入職場之策略規劃與技術布局能力。 課程包含六大新興、四大智慧、十大服務產業之策略規劃學理內涵、流程、技術研析與布局，並由案例說明導引分組討論與發表。
description.en: The purpose of the "Industry Strategic Planning and Technology Road-Mapping" class is to educate students to have the more insight capability on the Hi-Tech, Conventional, and Service Industries and to learn the processes of the strategic planning and technology road-mapping. This is also intent to assist the Technology University students to shorten their industry learning curve once they are hired. The class will introduce the Taiwan six emerging industries, four intelligent industries, and ten service industries including the background, justifications, process, and technology roadmap. Also, it will have the several case-studies to lead the student to do the exercise through the group discussion and present their findings and results.

notes: 大四、車輛所與職車輛所合開

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、IDEO公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives.Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions.  Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysisDesign Feature Attribute Mapping(Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

notes: 四設四、創新設計碩士--日、職合開、最後一哩

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(四)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(IV)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(四)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(IV)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

notes: 創新設計碩士-日、職合開

name.zh: 體驗行銷與產品設計實務

description.zh: 介紹體驗行銷之理論基礎及技巧以作為產品設計開發的策略，結合策略體驗模組及體驗媒介於產品設計之應用，以達創造出對顧客有價值的產品體驗之目標。
description.en: The fundamental theory and application skills of experiential marketing are to be introduced in this course as a product development strategy. The strategic experiential modules and the experiential media are applied in product design to create a valuable product experience for customers.

description.zh: 公共生活環境中存在許多設計上的問題．本課程藉由觀察記錄等研究方法訓練，幫助同學釐清問題核心，並針對公共環境中的產品進行設計提案，滿足不特定多數人的需求．
description.en: There are many design problems in public environment. This course “Public Design” are implemented by teaching observation methods training, to help students clarify the core of the problem, and proposal Design for the public environment eventually. Making all public design meet the specific needs of the majority of users.

notes: 創新設計碩士-日、職合開

name.en: Special Project for Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 本課程以實務案例介紹 (1)創新的本質，包括：技術創新、產品創新、策略創新、服務創新與管理創新，(2)創業的理念，包括創業家精神，創業的過程。學員將執行一項專題研究以演練創新創業實務。
description.en: This case-study-based course introduces (1) the nature of innovation, including technological innovation, product innovation, strategic innovation, service innovation and management innovation, and (2) the concept of entrepreneurship, including entrepreneurship and startup process. Students will conduct a special study to practice their basic skills on innovation and entrepreneurship.

notes: 創新設計碩士-日、職合開

description.zh: 通用使用性在探討多元化使用族群的適用介面，以突破性的概念(concept)包容不同能力、經驗與背景的族群，讓設計的介面能在最大的程度上被每個人使用。本課程講授通用使用性的背景與發展， 闡述產品與介面使用性之理論與面對多元化使用族群的挑戰。探討通用使用性的門徑（approaches），包括：adaptive interface、multi-layer interface、multimodal interaction、flexibility of software technology 及 cognitive consistency。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認通用使用性之方法與實務。
description.en: Universal Usability is a design approach that will accommodate the diversity of user base, while supports a broad range of hardware, software, and network access.This course explores the theories of Universal Usability that works for everyone across the spectrum of ability, experience level and back ground.Issues on usability of interface and product will be discussed in order to generate initiatives in response to unmet needs, and then accommodate individual differences among users.Design principle that enhances human experience will be reviewed, in which cognitive consistency is the most promising approach to achieving universal usability.To develop a philosophical direction of Universal Usability, students are required to study selected literature and present in seminar discussion group.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

notes: 創新設計碩士--日職合開

Try to master both the charm and the form of the model.  Next focusing on static mono-figure sketching, you have to demonstrate your techniques in presenting either the static or the dynamic, the state of tension or looseness. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. description.en: This course introduces students the state of art of the kitchen industries in Taiwan.  In order to prepare students to work in kitchen industries, experts are invited to address issues about the design, manufacturing, sale and service of kitchen appliances.  Some field trips are also arranged.

description.en: Introduction of the fundamental of 3D CAD technology and the manipulation of the software packages, Pro/ENGINEER, for product design in a concurrent engineering environment. By the practical projects, the students are trained more adept skill and application experience.

description.zh: 從展示空間之規劃過程讓學生了解規劃的基礎概念及空間設計之實務，以達到展示之最佳效果，例如施工設計、色彩、照明、空間結構、展示佈置以及櫥窗設計等展示效果。
description.en: This course develops the students understanding of the exhibition design process and practical experience such as lighting, coloring, space structure, arrangement and construction, and show window design.

description.zh: 室內設計場景細部的處理，例如進階的燈光及材質表現，同時培養同學互相討論與問題解決。
description.en: The sophisticated treatment for the scene of indoor design, like advanced light and material performance, which can train classmates to have the capacity of mutual discussion and problem-solving at the same time.

description.zh: 探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

notes: 家室組；新聘紀尚德1鐘點

description.zh: (一)嘗試引導同學作相關設計研究，探索符合社會、人文的設計策略，以國際消費者趨勢、競爭者分析、科技趨勢、國際設計研究為依據，用清晰的思路作不同的市場定位。(二)培養同學觀察市場，了解資訊。以一設計師應有能力，發展出利基性產品的關鍵性因素分析報告。並探索不同族群之消費行為分析，作為加速產品開發流程及建立利基性產品之依據，可爭取商機及最大利潤。(三) 每位同學需完成團隊分析報告，與授課老師指定之其他作業。
description.en: This course aims to help students to develop analysis skills on design trends in global context, including the sensibility and judgment of design style, design service, and design industry. Assignments include case studies other required reports.

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。

description.zh: 講授透視圖的基本原理、種類與方法及透視陰影,並以設計實例透視圖練習應用,培養靈活應用透視圖法於設計表達。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and skills of perspective drafting by specifically introducing perspective theories and ways of drawing, and being concurrent with the practice of drawing in industrial design.

description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

notes: 四子三四甲乙合開，限45人

name.zh: 人體生物學及生物物理學
name.en: Biology and Biophysics of Human Body

description.zh: 在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. It brings together a number of disciplines to help understand biomedical phenomena and the instrumentation that can be used to monitor these phenomena. It is primarily abo

description.zh: 在過去的60年裡，生物醫學工程學科發展已成為明確的，多樣化的，內容無所不包的領域；包括生物電現象、生物信息學、生物材料、生物力學、生物儀器、生物傳感器、生物信號處理等領域，以及生物技術、計算生物學和複雜多樣性、基因組學、醫學影像學、光學和雷射激光、輻射影像、組織工程等。本課程主要將適用於工程學門學生，且已完成物理、化學或生物學基礎課程為佳。此基礎在大二或大三的學生應該已可做好充分的準備。本課程將學習人體解剖學、生理學、生物物理學和生物醫學工程。整合了一系列知識，以幫助修課同學瞭解生物訊息和醫學儀器，並可以用來監測這些生物醫學現象。課程的學習主要是將這些生物醫學現象，運用其基礎於電力、壓力和流量的物理現象加以說明，並將這些生物醫學現象經由電子及工程的特殊條件和應用系統而呈現。在這種學習中，課程涵蓋了相關醫學和生物學領域、化學、物理、工程的知識和方法，期使將其成功及適當應用於多種生物醫學儀器。本課程將主要研習人體結構（解剖）及其功能系統（生理學），但這些原則同樣也可能適用於其它所有生命系統。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，結合工程及材料師長的經驗及參與，將可含括主要生醫工程及組織工程領域的基礎
description.en: Over the past sixty years, as the discipline of biomedical engineering has evolved, it has become clear that it is a diverse, seemingly all-encompassing field that includes such areas as bioelectric phenomena, bioinformatics, biomaterials, biomechanics, bioinstrumentation, biosensors, biosignal processing, biotechnology, computational biology and complexity, genomics, medical imaging, optics and lasers, radiation imaging, tissue engineering, moral and ethical issues. This course will be designed primarily for engineering students who have completed physical equations and a basic course in statics of chemistry and biology.  Students in their sophomore year or junior year should be adequately prepared for this course.  This course will be learning about human anatomy, biophysics, physiology, and biomedical engineering. name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、I公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。 使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives. Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions. description.zh: 介紹晶體形成過程、相變化與結構狀態、物性與化性關係以及其有關之探討技術與應用。
description.en: Solid state chemistry introduces the process of the crystal growth, phase change and the structural state.  The course also discusses the relationship of its chemical and physical properties.

notes: 四化甲乙丙與化工所合開

description.zh: 為涵養水量、維護水質以及保育水土資源，對於集水區內土地的使用，應有適當的規劃與管理牽涉的問題，一般以水資源利用、水質控制、管理計畫等課題加以涵括。因此本課程包含水資源情勢分析、水利法規、水權管理、點源及非點源污染管理、地下水規劃與管理、民眾參與及生態工法於集水區治理工程之應用等，俾提供適度發展及兼顧自然生態機能的集水區社區總體生活，達成「水、土、林、人」四贏之水資源保育總體目標。
description.en: In order to preserve water quantity, to protect water quality, and to conserve soil and water resources, it is necessary to institute appropriate land use regulations in a watershed. In general, it is included water resources utilization, water quality control and management. Therefore the major topics are water resources tendency, water law, water right, point and non-point sources pollution control, ground water management, public participation, ecological working method, etc. With appropriate public participation, the government can work together with people in community development in a manner which will enrich local cultural characteristics, and provide ideas for a sustainable growth, which would lead to a high quality of life and also would protect the watershed's ecology . The ultimate goal of making these efforts is to achieve a " water-soil-trees-men ", four-win situation.

name.en: Regional Methodology on Landscape and Architecture

description.zh: 本課程以地域論述為中心講述有關知識體系的基礎和架構。第一部份涵蓋人文主義地理學、文化地景、以及存在主義及其支系的現象學等基礎；第二部份講授以上述知識論為主的地景和建築詮釋與實踐，包括城市規劃、建築和地景建築理論等範疇的相應，介紹地域論者如Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton等人的觀點。第三部分為以台灣地區地域地景與建築思維的議題導向，進一步充實地域文化的空間-形式的智性思維。
description.en: This course is underpinned upon the epistemology of Regionalism that consisted of three parts. The first part traces back to Humanistic Geography, Cultural Landscape, Existentialism and its philosophical branch line-phenomenology, which are sources of the Regionalism. The second part is centered on interpretation and implementation in either landscape or architecture disciplines, in relation to the perspectives of city planning, architecture, and landscape architecture. And Regionalist advocates like Lewis Mumford, Liane Lefaivre, Alexander Tzonis, Kenneth Frampton and so on are included. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural Space-From topics are introduced to substantiate intellectual understandings.

notes: 碩士與碩專班合併開課

description.zh: 木構造建築因為低耗能、低碳排放，生長過程中又能固定碳，故可視為最佳之綠建築之建造型式。發展高層或大規模木造建築為世界趨勢及潮流，有鑑於建築系學生對於現代木造建築的結構行為及設計理論等專業知識付之闕如，為使其能更瞭解木構造建築，特以此講義及設計演習課程，介紹現代木構造的基本及應用知識及設計練習。
description.en: Wood as a renewable resource provides a non-negligible contribution to the protection of the environment. The fabrication of most wooden products requires less energy and natural resources than other building materials commonly used in the world. This lecture illustrates not only realized modern wooden constructions and applications; it also promotes future ideas for middle- and high-rise wooden buildings. Students will learn comprehensive knowledge and design application of modern wooden structure.

description.zh: 本課程為輔導學生在建築設計操作過程的不同階段，以適切且具創造力的表現媒材與技法呈現階段性的成果，從空間觀察與記錄、問題分析、概念發想、方案演化，直至具體方案的模擬與傳達性的說明，養成具備創意競賽實力與實務接軌能力的設計師。
description.en: As an integral part of the process of designing and understanding architecture, the course is structured to introduce advanced representational and fabrication techniques applied to architecture. Through experiential learning and exploring, students are expected to able to use different media to develop analytical, critical and representational skills and as generative design tools.

description.zh: 本課程首先介紹社區的階層意義及規劃程序及方法，其次舊社區規劃的主要內涵包括土地使用規劃、運輸規劃、公共設施規劃各以理論發展及案例操作說明，尤其是土地使用與運輸規劃之整合及鄰避性公共設施規劃案例之舉證。在就社區規劃後之整體開發方式說明，如何由二度的平面規劃成為三度空間的開發。期中考後將針對更前瞻性及更細緻的規劃技巧作為授課的內容，包括生態社區規劃的方法、災害及防災規劃，並舉科技的發展包括網際網路及捷運之發達對社區規劃的衝擊及因應。最後舉全球化及競爭力對社區發展的影響。另外以本人服務於實務界多年，得由同學指定欲瞭解或探討的課題由教師準備講授，以增加共同討論的意願，冀讓同學能對生活的空間有個全貌的初識。二個學分的課程僅能讓同學對環境有所管窺，希望加上其他的課程，讓同學進而因之他、關懷他、愛他而願意以專業與他結緣終生，那怕我們沒有好的居住環境！
description.en: This course is an introduction on the meaning of community hierarchy, the procedure and methodology of planning, as well as theoretical developments and case studies regarding major planning issues such as land use, transportation, and case studies on NIMBY facilities.Furthermore, I will also demonstrate planned unit developments and how to transform a two-dimensional planning into a three-dimensional development.After the midterm, I'll focus on more foresighted and deliberate planning techniques, including ecological community planning methods, disaster-preventive, planning, and the possible coping measures with respect to the impacts resulting from technological advances such as the internet and the mass transit systems. At the end, I'll also cover topics regarding the impacts of globalization and competition upon community developments.As I have had a lot of empirical experiences from my job, the students are allow to specify some topics or issues for this class so that the students

notes: 四建四與進修部二技合開【停開】

description.zh: 此課程為研究所初級課程，主要以三個方面介紹線性規劃：數學模型建立、演算法與原理、對偶理論及敏感度分析。
description.en: This is an introductory level course for graduate students. This course will cover linear programming including the mathematical models, the simplex methods, duality and sensitivity analysis.

notes: 四工四甲乙與工管所合開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何設計與應用微控制器，啟發學生對於微控制器的創意設計。包含：1.相關程式撰寫、2.跑馬燈程式撰寫與實作驗證、3.序列埠控制 (監控視窗、LED控制)、4.七段顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、5.LED矩陣程式撰寫與實作驗證、6.LCD顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、7. PWM馬達控制程式撰寫與實作驗證、8. I2C介面程式撰寫與實作驗證、9.電子琴程式撰寫與實作驗證。10.超音波感測程式撰寫與實作驗證。
description.en: This course is to train students for microcontrollers design and applications.  Inspire students to creative microcontroller design. Comprising: 1. Related programs written. 2. Marquee program written and implement verification. 3. Serial port control (monitoring windows, LED control). 4. Seven segment display program written and implement verification. 5. LED matrix program written and implement verification. 6. LCD display program written and implement verification. 7. PWM motor control program written and implement verification. 8. I2C interface program written and implement verification. 9. Keyboard program written and implement verification. 10. Ultrasonic sensing program written and implement verification.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討下列議題:文學與藝術的創作和女性自覺有什麼樣的關係?在現代社會,文學與藝術作品的創作與欣賞對女性又具有何種特別的意義?為追索答案,本課程引領學生探訪自十九世紀末期到今日在文藝界的女性翹楚,賞析她們在各自領域的獨特成就,並探究她?的天賦秉性與所置身之社會文化之互動關係.涵蓋的領域包括:詩,(短篇)小說,戲劇(舞台與電影劇本),散文,攝影,電影,繪畫,建築設計等當今文化重要面向.
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students toward a panoramic view and in-depth understanding of women's creativity at its highest level of achievement in the realms of British/American literature and the modern arts since the late nineteenth century.  We will study the most representative works by women writers in each of the following literary genres: poetry, short stories, novels, drama (and screenplays), and essays. We will also explore masterpieces of artworks by female artists in the following fields: film, photography, paintings and architectural designs. Students will be asked to explore the correlation among the significance of the writer/artist's works, the cultural background she is/was situated, and the individual talents and temperament of the writer/artist herself. The purpose of these investigations is to answer the following questions:  What do literature and art have to do with femininity in the modern world? What do literature and art mean to women?

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

name.zh: 語料庫語言學與英語教學

description.zh: 本課程提供關於語料庫語言學的介紹，包含語料庫分析工具、分析方法、語料庫設計與建構，及語料庫為本的研究方法等；同時，本課程亦探討其在英語教學上的應用。主要的主題涵蓋字彙教學與學習、詞組分析、中介語分析、教材分析、言談分析，及電腦輔助語言學習等。修課學生將學習如何針對不同研究主題，收集語料、構建小型語料庫，並運用所學之語料庫軟體進行語料分析等。
description.en: This course offers an introduction to corpus linguistics, including the corpus analytical tools, techniques, corpus design and construction, and methodologies for doing corpus-based studies. We will also discuss its applications in English language teaching and learning. Major topics include vocabulary teaching and learning, analysis of chunks, teaching materials analysis, interlanguage analysis, discourse analysis, and computer-assisted language learning. Students are expected to learn to collect corpora data, create a small corpus, run and analyze corpora data according to different research topics.

description.zh: 具備領導力和溝通技巧的知識，是經營管理學程中不可或缺的訓練。我們將由商業實務案例中，共同分析和探討，以培育學生為全球商業開發和經營的技能而準備。
description.en: This course, Leadership and Communication, is offered from a practitioner’s viewpoints on how to deploy the concepts, knowledge, and experiences for the development of leadership and communication practice in order to achieve the long-term business goals. The leadership role in the 21st century is not only for the internal management concerning but also for a broad range of issues, such as cross-cultural knowledge on business development, communications, negotiations, strategic thinking; and creative and innovative ideas. In other words, appropriate leadership and communication skills, in particular, are the killer-tactics to manage the current market-lead and ubiquitous technology driven world. We will review articles and discuss real business cases.

name.en: Fabrication of Potoelectronic Materials and Device

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。 1.單晶的生長 2.磊晶技術 3.擴散與離子植入 4.乾式及溫式蝕刻 5.化學蒸氣沈積法 6.金屬薄膜技術 7.光電元件製程 8.元件特性量測與分析
description.en: 1.Single crystal growth 2.Engitaxial technique 3.Diffusion and implantation 4.Dry and wet etching 5.Chemical vapor deposition 6.Metal film coating 7.Manufacturing process of photo electronic element 8.Characterization measurement and analysis of element

notes: 億光1035,系所合開,畢業後擬抵研究所學分請選研究所課

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡: 包括物質本性, 化學熱力學, 化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化: 包括化學反應速率與動力學, 分子反應動力學, 表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉質與量研究方法的設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、行動研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with qualitative and quantitative research procedures and the statistical design involved in education and applied linguistics research. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.zh: 半導體廠營運管理及先進製造技術
name.en: Fab Operation Management and Advanced Manufacturing Technology

description.zh: 半導體廠營運管理及先進製造技術這門課分為兩個部分；營運管理部分的課程內容主要是以IE的角度，探討IE在半導體廠中可以參與什麼樣的營運活動，其內容包含的課題如供應鏈管理、產能規劃、成本分析、預算管理、建廠及設施規劃、專案管理、策略規劃、技術移轉及開發管理以及合約及商業談判等。講師以其自身的經歷，提供給同學不同於教科書上的實務經驗。第二部分將以先進製造技術專題的方式講授，包含批次控制、虛擬量測、錯誤偵測、高混線生產等議題。
description.en: This lecture includes two segments. For “Operation Management”, a few popular topics will be addressed from I.E. point of view in a semiconductor company such as “Supply Chain Management”, “Capacity Planning”, “Cost Analysis”, “Budget Management”, “Construction and Facility Planning”, “Strategic Planning”, “Management in Technology Transfer and Development” and “Agreement and Business Negotiation”, etc. Instructor will share his personal experiences in practice which are quite different from the textbooks. For “Advanced Manufacturing Technology”, some state-of-the-art APC topics will be addressed. Included are “R2R Control”, “Virtual Metrology”, “Fault Detection”, “High-Mix Product Control”, among others.

name.zh: 半導體廠營運管理及先進製造技術
name.en: Fab Operation Management and Advanced Manufacturing Technology

notes: 四工四甲乙、工管所合開

description.zh: 本課程在研習數位電視，此課程包含 EDTV HDTV，SDTV。其課程目的在給予學習者了解數位電視分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.影像簡介， 2.顏色空間， 3.類比影像介面， 4.數位影像介面， 5.數位影像處理， 6. NTSC,  PAL, 和 SECAM 系統， 7. H.261 和 H.263， 8. MPEG， 9.數位電視。
description.en: This course is concerned with the digital television (DTV) design, which includes Enhanced Definition Television (EDTV), High Definition Television (HDTV), Standard Definition Television (SDTV). Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of DTV system, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1. Introduction to Video; 2. Color space; 3. Analog video interfaces; 4. Digital Video Interfaces; 5. Digital Video Processing; 6. NTSC, PAL, and SECAM system; 7. H.261 and H.263; 8. MPEG ; 9. Digital Television (DTV).

notes: 四子四甲乙與電子所合開，限25人

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh符號，2.演算法之分析，3.集合、優先佇列，4.樹、平衡樹，5.排序演算法，6.搜尋演算法，7.圖形演算法，8.幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems之理論及對策。
description.en: 1.Complexity 2.Analysis of algorithms3.Set,priorty queue4.Tree,Balanced tree5.Sorting algorithms6.Search algorithms7.Graph algorithms8.Geometry algorithms9.NP-complete problems

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹並討論衡量系統可靠度常用的機率模式、串連系統、並連系統及混合式系統的可靠度特性及其評估方式。此外也介紹評估實際系統時常用的統計方法及資料蒐集和推論的技巧，最後討論可修護系統的可靠度衡量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss how to construct the structure fuhction of a system and to culculate its reliability.some probability models and probability distributions that are commonly used for lifetime representations will be introduced.series system,parallel system,and the conlination of both will be thorouqhly diseerssed in respect of their reliability characteristics. The statistical mefthods related to data colleetion and inference that are useful when evaluating the reliability of real-life systems will also be mentioned. Finally,we will introduce the concept of repairabie systems and related probability models.

description.zh: 此課程旨在以人為本，研究互動系統之設計與評估。使學生了解人類認知過程之理論與模式以及其工作與環境之特性，並使學生能應用設計程序與評估方法來提升系統之績效。
description.en: This course focuses on the design and evaluation of interactive systems from a human centric perspective. Students will learn about the theories and models of human cognitive processing with the consideration of task and enviroment characteristics; and students will learn how to apply design processes and evaluation techniques for improving system performance.

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調管理專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service management students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.
