description.zh: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' competence in English through reading popularculture. The reading will cover a wide variety of "texts" in popular literature, film, music, sports, television and on the Net.  Special emphasis will be put on rhetoric analysis, text summarization, and critical comprehension skills such as identifying themain ideas and supporting details, recognizing context clues, drawing inferences and making critical judgments

name.en: English Presentation for Academic Purposes & Discussion

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授學術簡報要點、介紹常用句型和字彙，主要加強學生英語口語表達流暢及準確度。透過認識簡報流程與架構提昇學術及工作所需之英文簡報能力。
description.en: A course for students giving oral academic presentations in colleges and universities. Learner outcomes include general academic vocabulary development, listening skill improvement in an academic setting, development of effective note-taking skills, and improved academic discussion and presentation skills. Activities include formal presentations, discussions, and reports.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

notes: 外師授課；以多益550分為目標

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

description.zh: 本課內容包括高分子鏈之統計力學、高分子之界面作用力及Flory-Huggin理論。  對於紡織技術學程的規劃，本課程會注重紡織纖維的合成技術，例如用奈米技術加在Nylon纖維上，例如以clay加強Nylon的強度及磨耗性質，用理論的探討例如用Halpin-Tsai equation去預測紡織纖維的楊氏係數，另外也會加強高分子物理化學在紡織纖維成型過程中所扮演的角色。
description.en: The course includes; statistics of polymer chain, interfacial polymer force, Florry-Huggun theory.A major objective of this course is to provide a background in polymerizations, polymer structures and polymer properties. The material in this course also covers polymer characterization, polymer rheology and polymer processing. In addition, structures, properties, usages and products of rubbers, plastics and fibers are emphasized and compared. The object of this course is also to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization. A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties.

description.zh: 以纖維材料與複合材料的知識為基礎，實際應用於纖維系複合材料實習；並利用各種現有之機械與電氣性質檢測儀器，對其性能加以評估。其實習內容包括熱可塑與熱固性樹脂之製備；單軸向、雙軸向與三軸向複合材料之加工等之實習;及複合材料機械與電氣性質等之實習。
description.en: On the basis of knowledge from the fiber and composites, various experiments are carried out.  Different measuring instruments are also used to measure and evaluate their mechanical and electrical properties.  The practice includes thermoplastic and thermosetting resin preparation, fiber prepreg preparation, 1-D, 2-D, and 3-D composites processing methods are included. Such as filament winding, hand lay-up, molding compounds, autoclave and vacuum bag method, injection molding, compression molding, SMC, and BMC, pultrusion etc. Otherwise, the mechanical and electrical properties of the composites are also studied.

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 蛋白質體學工程學，是結合蛋白質生化技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於蛋白質生化技術的快速發展，蛋白質序列的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。蛋白質體工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
description.en: Proteomic engineering is a newly developed field joining the knowledge from protein biochemistry and computational technology. Biochemistry techniques in high speed screening such 2D gel and mass-spectrometry have generated large amount of data.  From these data, new frontier in biomedical researches can be explored. Proteomic engineering is one of the essential discipline of biotechnology。

description.zh: 數位製造為一利用數位輔助設計軟體與製造工具將設計想法實現的過程。本課程將這個過程所需要的數位技術模組化，並以系統性的方式逐一介紹各技術模組的理論與操作，藉以培養以三維方式進行設計思考，並能以數位設計與製造流程來實現設計的能力。
description.en: Digital fabrication is a process to realize a design idea through the use of 3D modeling and manufacturing tools. The modularized technologies related to the digital fabrication will be introduced systematically in this course. The aim of this course is to extend the computer-aided design workflow from design thinking to digital fabrication.

description.zh: 1. 架構影片後期製作流程2. 電腦動畫及視覺特效於影片後製作階段的應用3. 學習合成與剪接的概念與技巧4. 暸解最新動畫影視特效趨勢及發展5. 培養後期製作專案提案與執行能力
description.en: 1. To construct a post-production project2. To apply animation and visual effects to post-production works3. To develop concepts and skills in compositing and editing4. To understand the trends and development in animation effects5. To develop the ability to propose and execute a post-production project

description.zh: 社會設計，目前在國內雖較少被提出討論，但卻是近年來國外在探討企業創新時的關鍵趨勢。因此本課程將邀請各界專家分享他們是什麼契機下開始關注社會設計，也分別舉出幾個國內、外的實例來說明，並將結合互動媒體的科技優勢來進行創作。因為社會設計不應只被視為政府單位或非營利組織的推動事務，其實每一個人或民間企業，都極有可能運用設計來創造出很不一樣的社會價值。
description.en: Social design have been much discussed widespread in business innovation but rarely in Taiwan. In this course, we invite experts to share at what moment they begin to focus on social design, giving examples worldwide, and creating works that combine interactive media. Social design is not just a policy that run by government or non-governmental organization, you and I can use design to create unique social value.

description.zh: 本課程重點為（一）為簡淺明確的商用英文、（二）與時並進的國際經濟貿易實務，內容涵蓋法律、外匯與銀行、倉儲運輸，國際金融、國際行銷學、廣告學、包裝學、海上保險及度量衡。
description.en: This course acquaints students with present-day commercial English and trade practice, the content of which includes Laws, Foreign Exchange and Banking, Warehousing and Transportation, International Financing, International Marketing, Advertising, Packaging, Marine Insurance and Weights and Measures.

name.en: Seminar in Applied Linguistics and Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 應用語言學與文化應用研究相關專題，以邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to enhance students' know-how and research skills in applied linguistics and applied cultural studies. Students will participate in academic speeches and respond to academic papers in group discussion.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹細胞培養與基因工程之方法與應用。課程內容涵蓋微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之介紹，細胞生長與代謝，細胞培養方法，生物反應器，基因工程技術與應用實例。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to introduce the technology of cell culture and genetic engineering. The topics include: (1) introduction of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells (2) cell metabolism and growth (3) cultivation of cells in bioreactors (4) fundamentals of genetic engineering (5) application examples.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

notes: 四分四和高分所碩士班合開【停開】

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

notes: 四分四和高分所碩士班合開【停開】

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機器人簡介、齊次轉換矩陣、運動方程式及反運動方程式、軌跡規劃、機器人動力學、機器人控制系統、機器人程式語言、機器人於工業界之應用技術。
description.en: Introduction to Robotic Manipulators, Homogeneous Transformations, Kinematic Equations and Solutions, Trajectory Planning, Dynamics and Control of Robots, Programming and Applications.

notes: 甲乙丙合開 一般教室 綜科327 限24人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源、致動器、控制元件及迴路、傳送、配管、維護與安全、液氣壓比例與伺服控制、自動控制理論應用於液氣壓工程。
description.en: Introduction to Pneumatic Engineering, Characteristic of Compressible Gas, Air Conditioning & Control, Pneumatic Parts & Control Circuit, Application of Sequence Controller on Pneumatic Control, Introduction to Hydraulic Engineering, Characteristic & Conditioning of Hydraulic Fluid, Hydraulic Theory, Power Unit, Actuator, Control Parts & safety,Hydraulic & Pneumatic Proportional & Servo Control, and Application of Automatic Control to Hydraulic Engineering.

description.zh: 先修課程：機動學(機構學)、計算機(電腦)程式語言概論、機構運動分析(位置、速度及加速度分析的解析法)、連桿組傳遞角與機械利益的分析、凸輪機構運動分析、壓力角與曲率半徑的分析、齒輪組動力傳遞分析、機構的電腦模擬、機構個案分析。
description.en: Introduction, Kinematic analysis of mechanism(Analysis of Displacement, Velocity and Acceleration by Analytical method), Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage of Linkage, Kinematic Analysis, Pressure angle and Profile's Curvature of Cam, Power Flow Analysis of Gear Trains, Computer Simulation of Mechanisms, and Case Study of Mechanism.

notes: 甲乙丙合開 限25人(綜科114)

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。本課程目的在介紹蓬勃發展中的微機電系統(micro-electro-mechanical systems, MEMS)工程與最新應用。其內容包括 : MEMS之概念與特性、微觀設計原則、跨領域模擬分析、加工材料分類、主要製程技術介紹、CMOS-MEMS整合製造、封裝與測試技術、微感測器與微致動器、智慧型元件與SOC、工程應用實例介紹
description.en: The course contents include concept and characteristics of MEMS, principles of micro system design, inter-disciplinary simulation and analysis, materials for MEMS, main-stream MEMS processing technologies, CMOS-MEMS process integration, package and test techniques, micro sensors and actuators, smart devices and SOC, and closure with a number of engineering applications.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh: (1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

notes: 與最後一哩合開，限機械系大三大四，30人(綜科328-1)

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。1.數位影像基礎，2.空間域影像強化，3.頻域影像強化，4.影像還原，5彩色影像處理，6形態學影像處理，7.影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9.機器視覺系統。
description.en: 1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．

description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of artificial intelligent methods and apply these methods to innovative applications of Internet of Things. The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic information management techniques and creativity case studies.  The goal is to let the students realize how to apply information management techniques. The contents include information strategies management, database management, big data, network management, software engineering, discussions and case studies on creativity, information management and creativity inspiration, and so forth.

description.en: This course is to instruct students to practice the entrepreneurship and innovation. Students will form an entrepreneurship team. Teacher will guide the students throughout the entrepreneurship processes. University will offer students initial funds and incubation assistances. Students will gain practical experiences on how to establish entrepreneurship. The contents include entrepreneurial thoughts and actions, design thinking, self-understanding, team formation, business model development, entrepreneurship finance, entrepreneurship practices, entrepreneurship contests, and so on.

description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 簡單直流電源製作，I/O (8255介面電路試作與測試)，各種Sensor結構與使用方法介紹，語言程式介紹，Sensor與I/O介面，步進馬達與伺服馬達控制，AD與DA轉換器，光學尺、編碼器組裝與控制，控制加工機台、精度調整。

Stepping and servo motor controller 7. AD and DA converters8. Assembly and control of optical scale and encoder 9. Setup and control of the machine

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。感測器與驅動器簡介，資料傳輸方法，物理式感測器與驅動器：聲動式，磁式性，壓電式，電力式，電磁式，熱電式，熱阻式，光導式，光發射式，光電式。化學式感測器與驅動器：化學與氣體感測器,生醫感測器與生物晶片
description.en: Introduction to sensors and actuators, data transmission methods, physics based sensors and actuators：sonic, magnetic, piezoelectric, electrical, electromagnetic, thermoelectric, thermoresistive, photoconductive, photoemissive, photovoltaic; chemistry based sensors and actuators：chemical and gas sensors, bio-medical sensors and biochips.

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料(包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等)基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1)課程簡介, (2)電化學基本原理與應用, (3)水溶液系統電池分類與應用,(4)非水溶液系統電池分類與應用, (5)鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程, (6)鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (7)鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (8)電解液材料與高分子電池特性, (9)隔離膜材料功能與製作, (10)薄膜電池, (11)超高電容器材料原理與應用, (12)儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

notes: 材料所與材料所在職專班合開

name.zh: 繞射光學原理與應用含實習
name.en: Theory and Application of Diffractive Optics with Lab practice

description.zh: 繞射光學是基於光波繞射的原理，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、此類的微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：1.光學繞射原理2.傅式光學3.繞射光學元件之設計方法4.繞射光學元件之應用5.繞射光學元件之實現與製作
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the principle of diffraction of optical wave and study the means of using the diffraction to perform optical setups in modern optical systems. Diffractive optical element (DOE) can be applied to correct aberrations, light focusing, light splitting, and other novel functions that traditional optical components difficultly or impossibly perform. DOE plays an important role in modern optical technology. The content of this course includes: 1. Principle of optical diffraction, 2. Fourier optics, 3. Design methods of DOE, 4. Applications of DOEs, and 5. Implementation of DOEs.

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

description.zh: 「系統整合指標」是智慧建築標章的基礎設施指標群，是做為評定在建築物內各項自動化服務系統在系統整合上之作為、成效與效益。本課程將培養具備建築應用子系統運作原理與設計要點及工程執行作業與管理的基礎能力。授課之內容如下：智慧建築系統整合指標以及各應用子系統，如中央監控系統、門禁與保全系統、對講與停車場系統、資通訊系統、綜合佈線與弱電系統、照明系統與CCTV監視系統、智慧家庭與物業管理系統之規劃設計及工程執行管理。
description.en: "System integration index" is the intelligent building marker infrastructure target group, is assessed as a service in the building automation system, the integration of the system as the effectiveness and benefit.This course will train with the principle of operation and construction applications subsystem design features and engineering job execution and management of basic capabilities.Teaching content as follows: Intelligent building integrated system of indicators as well as the application subsystems, such as the central monitoring system, access control and security systems, intercom and parking systems, ICT systems, premises distribution system and electronic systems, lighting systems and CCTV surveillance systems, intelligence design and planning of family and property management systems and project execution management.

notes: 電機系三四年級、電子系三四年級與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusion, and information technology impact on knowledge management.

description.zh: 即使科學昌明如此，但我們日常生活中使用的、不斷推陳出新的照相機、攝錄影機、影印機等，在在都說明幾何光學現在仍然是主宰設計的工具。光學主要是藉著對光本質方面的瞭解，發展有關的理論基礎與計算法則，並進而用在日常生活且增益人類福祉的一門科學。幾何光學則是光學理論中，一連串近似運算的結果，著重在成像的效果和應用的一門工具性知識。本系之幾何光學是一學期、三學分、每週三小時的課程，教學內容大致包含以下三部份：一、介紹光的性質、在介面上反射、折射之有關定理、成像的原因及應用。二、分析像差現象及其成因與評估。三、淺介透鏡之設計。
description.en: Light is the principal means by which we gain knowledge of the world. From putting continually the improved camera, video cassette recorder, copying machine, etc., to market can just account for how important a designing tool the Geometric-Optics is.To build a solid basic theory and a rule for calculating through understanding thoroughly the nature of light is the central goal of Optics. Using the basic theory of optics and processes of approximate estimate, the Geometric-Optics put its point on image formation and its applications.Here in our department, the Geometric-Optics is a 3-credit, 3-hour per week, one-semester course. There are three consecutives parts in the one-semester lecture:The 1st part : (a)the nature of light, (b)the related theorems about reflection and refraction, (c) image formation.The 2nd part : the formation and correctness of aberrations.The 3rd part : the designing of lenses.

description.zh: 本課程介紹國際金融市場以及金融系統。本課程涵蓋範圍包含: 股票市場、貨幣市場、債券市場、外匯市場、房貸市場、投資銀行、保險產業、基金市場…等。主要目的在讓學生了解整個金融市場是如何運作。同時以個案討論方式讓學生對整體的金融市場與機構有通盤的了解。
description.en: This course introduces the international financial markets (i.e. money market, bond market, stock market, mortgage market, foreign exchange market, investment banks, commercial banks…etc). The objectives of this course are to develop a fundamental understanding of (i) how financial markets work; (ii) how financial systems affect people and daily life.

Further applications applying human factors and ergonomics in product development and system design are considered.

This course is designed for students who want to participate in professional certification, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to assist students information basics and media design professional capability, and to develop their employability and competitiveness.

notes: 四資財三與碩士班、最後一哩合開

name.zh: 資訊創新達人國際證照講座
name.en: Seminar of International Certification on Informational Creativity Experts

description.zh: 為提升學生資訊媒體創新應用能力，培養敬業樂業精神與優良就業態度，增加職場就業競爭力。因此，透過本實務講座，針對資訊軟體ADOBE PHOTOSHOP應用、平面設計人員、影像處理等國際專業證照開設輔導課程。本課程將介紹資訊媒體基本知識與從業人員應具備的專業職能，並輔導同學取得國際專業證照，適合於有志從事資訊媒體與設計相關工作及大學校院相關系所學生。俾培育學生參加並通過專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長，並提升畢業後之職場競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to introduce practices of international certification in information and multimedia. This course is designed for students who want to participate in professional certification, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to assist students information basics and media design professional capability, and to develop their employability and competitiveness.

notes: 四資財三與碩士班、最後一哩合開

name.zh: 企業永續與生命週期管理特論
name.en: Special Topics on Corporate Sustainability and Life Cycle Management

description.zh: 這主要是給開給博士生及二年級以上碩士生的課程，將主要以課題式(Topics)的討論為主, 討論將會以最新之期刊論文為主, 內容探討的議題將包括(不限):1.企業永續治理(Corporate Sustainable Governance)2.企業永續揭露及報告(Sustainability Disclosure and Reporting)3.綠色與永續創新(Green and Sustainable Competitiveness)4.繁茂昌盛(Flourishing vs. Sustainability)5.地球限度(Planetary Boundaries)如何整合至企業經營之中6.B團隊及B計畫(B Team and Plan B)7.LCA-based的ISO標準及其發展8.社會面相之生命週期評估(SLCA)9.生命週期永續性評估(LCSA)10.金字塔底層(Base of the Pyramid)11.其他
description.en: This course is mainly for doctorial students and senior master students. Advanced and newly developed topics on Corporate Sustainability and Life Cycle Assessment and Management will be studied and students will be asked to find and read research papers for discussion. Related topics are included as follows(not limited):1.Corporate Sustainable Governance2.Sustainability Disclosure and Reporting3.Green and Sustainable Competitiveness4.Flourishing vs. Sustainability5.Planetary Boundaries6.B Team and Plan B7.LCA-based ISO international Standards8.Social Life Cycle Assessment(SLCA)9.Life Cycle Sustainability Assessment (LCSA)10.Base of the Pyramid11.Others

description.zh: 討論當使用計算機來解決數學問題時的能力及限制,並介紹相關改進或解決的方法. 主題內容包含: (1) 誤差, (2) 數值演算法, (3) 數學計算軟體, (4) 浮點運算, (5) 矩陣運算, (6) 多項式內插法, (7)數值積分, (8)非線性方程式, (9)初值問題.
description.en: This course discusses the constraints when using computers to solve mathematical problems, and introduces some numerical methods to improve or overcome the difficulty. Covered topics include: (1) Errors, (2) Numerical Algorithms, (3) Mathematical Software, (4) Floating-point Computations, (5) Matrix Computations, (6) Polynomial Interpolation, (7) Numerical Integration, (8) Nonlinear Equations, (9) The Initial Value Problem.

name.zh: CMOS元件量測與可靠度工程
name.en: CMOS Device Measurement and Reliability Engineering

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。課程簡介，材料簡介，量子效應，被動元件，被動元件特性，主動元件，主動元件特性，主動元件參數，元件設計，參數粹取，氧化層可靠性分析，熱載子效應，金屬漂移分析，產品可靠性分析(包括靜電防護)。
description.en: Introduction, semiconductor materials, quantum effect, passive devices, characteristics of passive devices, active devices, characteristics of active devices, parameters of active devices, pattern designs., parameter extraction, oxide reliability analysis, hot carrier effect, metal migration analysis, product reliability analysis (including ESD protection).

name.en: Special topics of modern manufacturing technology

description.zh: 介紹最新製造技術中的特殊項目，包括：1、製造實驗及統計分析2、製造設備，強調電腦化的運動控制及製程控制3、電腦化的製造系統，如CAD、CAM、CIM、LAN及因電腦化產生的系統進化。
description.en: Introducing special topics of newest manufacturing technology. Including:1.Manufacturing experiments and statistical evaluation.2.Manufacturing equipment, emphasizing on computerized motion control and process control.3.Computerized manufacturing system, like CAD, CAM, CIM, LAN, and manufacturing system 's evolution due to computerization.

description.zh: 本課程針對SGS檢驗公司為台北科技大學學生設計的先進儀器分析講座，針對目前生活中食品安全、衣物安全等，與人切身關係的民生用品及環境安全之議題所衍生之有害物質分析，邀請SGS企業講師進行先進儀器分析演講及實機訓練，並於課程中安排學生到SGS公司實地見習。
description.en: The course is to introduce advanced instrumental analysis technology for Hazardous Substances in our daily life. This course will invite world well-known company, SGS to share their success stories and new technology with the students.

notes: 四分三四與最後一哩合開，有一場參訪活動

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

name.zh: 國際專業證照研訓實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本「國際專業證照研訓實務講座」課程針對國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。本學期專門培訓學生通過Microsoft 國際證照之Word 與Excel為目標，以協助同學建立跨領域與國際化能力之專長。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of international professional licenses in management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation. This semester will help students to pass the licenses of Word and Excel, and further to obtain the interdisciplinary expertise with international capabilities.

notes: 計網電腦教室，限60人【停開】

name.en: Intelligent Applications of Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生機器學習、大數據等人工智慧技術，並使用在物聯網的創新與應用上。課程內容包括：人工智慧概論、大數據方法、機器學習方法、資料探勘方法、最佳化方法、物聯網概論、影音處理、雲端技術、物聯網系統實作等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of artificial intelligent methods and apply these methods to innovative applications of Internet of Things. The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

notes: 資財,電子,電機,資工系所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養-馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家特別是東協五國經濟成長迅速，藉由傳授東南亞四小語以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖並促進台灣與東南亞國家之間的經貿關係。本課程旨在培養學生的基本溝通能力，運用馬來語來與當地馬來母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries.This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

notes: 四土四甲乙與最後一哩合開，限30人

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電磁波散射與微波電路組件為主，深入介紹下列議題並討論如何分析、設計、製作與量測：1.雷達系統之簡介。2.智慧型車用雷達。3.表面散射與體積散射。4.微波遙測。5.各種高頻轉接電路的設計。 6.各種高頻平面電路的設計。7.多端埠平面電路的量測校正技術。
description.en: 1. Introduction to radar systems.2. Intelligent vehicular radar systems.3. Surface scattering and volume scattering.4. Microwave remote sensing.5. Designs for various high-frequency transitions. 6. Designs for various high-frequency planar circuits.7. Measurement and calibration techniques for multi-port planar circuits.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。主要讓學生具有電腦控制之概念其內容涵蓋:電腦周邊設備簡介，PC-base 控制簡介，介面卡之選用，A/D與 D/A轉換原理與應用，I/O 介面實驗，程式設計與外部機械控制
description.en: Introduction of concept of computer control system, computer architecture, PC-base control unit, motion elements, selection of PC interface card, application of A/D and D/A conversion, program design and machine control

description.zh: 深入探討最新的IC製程技術，包含前段的加熱、離子植入、物理沈積、化學沈積、微影、蝕刻等製程，及後段的各種封裝技術及測試方法，並介紹其研究方向、製程與元件物理的關係及製程整合的技術。
description.en: Study the state of the art of the IC fabrication processes, including heating, ion implant, PVD, CVD, lithograph, etching of the front-end processes and packaging and testing of back-end processes. The trends of the processes, the relationship of the processes with the physics of the devices and the process integrating technology will also be taught in this course.

description.zh: 設計領導係指領導設計與透過設計領導事業，環視益形挑戰與機會的設計創新環境，深具前瞻洞察力的願景與策略是贏得設計領導地位之關鍵因素。本課程含蓋相關文獻理論與實務案例，透過個案研討深入探究如何贏得企業設計領導競爭優勢與永續繁榮成功之道。
description.en: Design leadership means to design and to lead-to lead design and to lead business by design. Today, those responsible for design creation face leadership challenges and opportunities greater than ever before. Who should lead design? Who leads by design? How and why does a company "lead with design?" Design leadership has many interpretations, ranging from inspiration to collaboration and from culture to globalization. Design leadership is a commercial imperative. It creates differentiation, sustains competitive advantage, and enables world-class performance that is sustainable into the future.This course will provide the insight and interaction essential to utilizing design leadership for business success. Vision and strategy are the critical elements of leadership. It covers the strategy and the effects of inspiring design leadership and the personal characteristics and attributes of great design leaders.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh: 經濟學重視邏輯與嚴謹推理的理性特質是其主要特色，此亦為理工科系人之專長優勢，然而僅偏重左腦訓練的人才往往讓人覺得生冷機械，對事物看法也常過於直接而缺乏人情，若能在不失理性效率之下，兼顧以人為本之社會人文感性關懷，則經濟學自無愧為社會科學之母，其訓練目標亦與通識教育的人格均衡發展目的一致！為避免陷入一般經濟教學因理論工具比重過高而失焦，導致學生學習興趣驟減以致成效不彰，本課程重點在於先讓學生擁有強烈之學習動機，接著認知到"確立學習目的"的重要性，藉由生活實例直接帶領學生面對並感受問題，從而引導出經濟學切入問題的思維方式，並傳授其正確可行的學習態度與方法，同時提醒學生維持對專業知識批判的精神，在嚴謹訓練架構下督促其尋求感性的意涵，因而不致陷入經濟工具與名詞的浩瀚泥沼中，從而漸進體會出經濟學之精髓。
description.en: The science of economics is characterized by logics and cautious reasoning-at which most of the students of natural science and technology are good at. It is also a fact that those who take better advantage of the right brain are very likely to be straightforward and thus seemingly more mechanical and unsympathetic. Economics can be seen as the mother of science under the condition that rational efficiency-as well as the socially humanity--are kept at the same time. As a matter of act, the economic trainings share the same goal as what is required by the General Education courses.The first priority of the course is to highly motivate the students in the economic issues. We do our best to avoid too much weight generally put into teaching economics, leading to poor learning and teaching experience. Cases are studied in such a way that students will recognize the "real purpose of studying."  Real cases and examples are brought into discussion. We guide the students to"feel"the problems.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 透過一系列的資料採集、參考與互動，包含經驗分享、影片欣賞等，帶領修課同學探索創新（Innovation）、創業（Startup）以及最重要的 – 創業家創新精神（Entrepreneur Innovative Thinking）之本質。無論是工作上的創造，學習上的創造，或者是(創)事業上的創造，都必然需要一定程度的創新，才能在全球化競爭以及指數型科技（Exponential Technology）發展的趨勢下存活，最終獲得勝利、創造價值。
description.en: Through series of classes to train students embracing the innovative thinking and gradually internalize it to become innovative entrepreneurship. Since the generation is changing so rapidly, the competitors are no longer came from local land but from everywhere in global village. Under this highly competitive world, every one of us need to fully embrace the true value of innovation, and incubate our own entrepreneurship with hack spirit, which will lead us to an island of innovation.

description.zh: 透過分析創新成功之實際個案，讓修課同學了解創新的本質。課程中將介紹不同類型的創新個案，包括：技術創新、產品創新、服務創新與管理創新。本課程也擬搭配邀請成功之創業顧問與談，提供實務經驗，分享創業者該有的認知以及創業的重要理念，當然也包括分享他們在邀創業過程中所面臨的各類挑戰。創業是每個人都曾經懷抱過的夢想，透過創新成功之個案的分析，可以了解到個案公司是如何有步驟的循序漸進。針對每個個案，我們要求每位同學於課前完成個案的閱讀，並於上課前交出本次課程的課前預習心得。我們希望每位參與的同學都能在討論時充分表達意見，遇有不清楚或不同意見時能夠勇於提出他們的看法。本課程擬營造出一種研究的環境，讓學生可以針對個案盡其所能清楚的提出建議並來說服同儕。
description.en: The course enable participant to realize the essential features of innovation via cases study. Various types of innovation cases are included, such as: technology innovation, service innovation and management innovation. We also plan to invites some successful constants to give participants talk and share their experiences, including the challenge and their resolving process.The real case study enables participants to understand the entrepreneurship and the steps to start a business. The participants are required to complete the case reading and a preview report is required in advance the class. We hope that every participant can propose their opinion and persuade others colleges of their viewpoints.

description.zh: 台灣的歷史從無文字傳統的原住民起，到17世紀西班牙、荷蘭海上競逐開始，漢人隨之移墾台灣，成為這塊土地最主要的住民。本課程的內容將依時間先後，將荷蘭西班牙殖民時期、鄭氏王國、清代台灣、日治時期與國民政府時期重要歷史大事、人物等依據講義講解，內容有政治、宗教、文化、經濟、社會等各層面的重要事件、人物以及歷史發展。
description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 學習邏輯推理主要的目的便是幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠為我們的人生做出正確的判斷。本課程包括:邏輯的基本觀念，真值表推論法，語句邏輯中自然演繹法的18條基本推論規則，語句邏輯的基本公理系統，量化邏輯中自然演繹法的基本規論推測，量化邏輯的詮釋方法，量化邏輯的基本公理系統，語句邏輯的後設理論，量化邏輯的後設理論，傳統的三段論法，謬誤理論、與介於自然與形式語言之間的翻譯等等。
description.en: The main purpose of studying "Logical Inference" is to help us obtain a kind of logical ability, by means of which we will be able to make right choices for our life. This courses covers at least the following topics: basic ideas in logic, the truth table method, 18 basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in sentential logic, basic axiomatic systems in sentential logic, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, interpretations in quantificational logic, basic axiomatic systems in quantificational logic, meta-theorem in sentential logic, meta-theorem in quantificational logic, traditional syllogism, the fallacy theory, and the translation between natural and formal language, etc.

description.zh: 生態與環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解生態環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境污染問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Ecology and Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize its importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 生態與環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解生態環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境污染問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Ecology and Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize its importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 植物與人類生活息息相關，人類選擇植物加以栽培生產，用來提供食、衣、行、及健康所需，而農耕的發達則與人類文化及社會的演變互相影響。本課程將由各種不同角度介紹，包括植物特性、栽培管理技術、自然環境、地理、人文、社會、政治、經濟等方面，與植物生產的關係。主旨希望同學能了解人類與植物間相依相存的關係，並進一步關懷人類、植物、與自然環境之間的相處之道。
description.en: Plants supply major food for all kinds of living organisms.  This lecture is prepared to introduce the relationship between the crop plant and modern food  production.  The whole spectrum will be viewed from the aspect of the chacteristics of platns, the nature environment, science, human civilization, society, politics and economics, etc..  Hope students can concern and respect the mutuality between plants and human.

description.zh: 鴉片戰爭一役，滿清政權遭到慘敗，開啟了中國三千年未有之大變局。之後一連串的失敗，中國更是屢戰屢敗，割地、賠款之餘，也出讓國家的利權，不平等條約破壞了中國領土的完整與主權的獨立。此期間雖部分有識之士提倡洋務運動和維新變法，希滿清政府能即時奮發圖強，應付危機，無奈守舊派人士反對，且積弊已深，故改革的成績不如預期，以致革命的號角響起，滿清即隨之土崩瓦解。本課程主要是以近代的重大事件為主，分析發生的原因及其影響。課程也包含台灣史在內，讓同學們對生於斯長於斯的故鄉，有更深一層的認識和了解。
description.en: The complete defeat of Ching Dynasty in the Opium War initiates tremendous changes that have never been discovered in the three-thousand-year history of China. The subsequent military defeats after the War also lead to a series of arrogation of land, monetary reparations and even the yield of sovereignty. The unequalized treaties cause a great damage to the wholeness of the land of China and the national sovereignty. During the period, some of the pioneering statesmen work to advocate the westernized campaigns and to renew the old political systems in the hope that Ching administration could cope with whatever crises that might arise, but unfortunately, the reformation does not go as successfully as is expected due to the objection from the conservative circles. As the bugle of revolution vibrates, Ching Dynasty thus disintegrates soon. The course mainly discusses significant events, their causes and subsequent effects, the history of Taiwan also included so that the students would fur

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 透過創造力理論建立與創造思考的策略與方法實例演練, 強化學生創意思考能力，讓學生有應用想像力的機會，以培養學生流暢、變通、獨創及精密的思考能力, 進而激發出無限創意潛能。
description.en: Through the establishment of creativity theories and the practices of the methods of creative thinking, students apply their imagination to problem solving. The aim of this course is to stimulating students' creativity by training their thinking modes to be fluent, flexible, original, and precise.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

name.en: The Cultural History of Chinese Medicine

description.zh: 本課程結合考古發現、出土文物、傳世圖書及近人研究，討論中國這塊地域自有文字出現以來的醫療文化變遷。經由本課程學生可以瞭解傳統中國社的醫療知識和社會、文化與政治間的可能關係。
description.en: The contents of this course include archaeological discoveries, unearthed artifacts, written documents and recent literature, and focuses on the medical and cultural changes in Chinese history. Students who take this course will be able to comprehend the medical knowledge as well as the interrelations among social, cultural and political dimensions in traditional China.

description.zh: 本課程探討介紹勞工問題及勞資爭議的基本概念，同時輔以相關案例的檢討分析，以提升學生對於問題的了解，同時幫助學生學習職場溝通，以建立和諧及合作的勞資關係。
description.en: The main  purpose  of  the  course   is  to  discuss  about  problems  arising  from  labor  relation  and  how  to  settle  it  . This  course  focuses  on  the  introduction  to  the  fundamental  ideas  of  labor  problems  and  labor  disputes .  Many  relevant  cases  are  presented  in  class  for  further  discussion  and  analysis  .  It  also  helps  students  to  communicate  with  other  people  in  work  place  so  as  to  establish  a  harmonic  and  cooperative  industrial  relationship .

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 資訊法律課程將讓同學了解網路資訊社會中各層面的相關法律議題。本課程內容著重於各種網路法律問題，例如資訊安全、網路契約的訂定、網域名稱、數位化著作權、商標權，隱私權以及電腦犯罪種類及防治的介紹。另外，本課程也以個案方式，敘述電腦資訊的相關法律問題，並從中了解虛擬世界與現實世界的法律規範，同時測試自己是否具備足夠的資訊法律知識，能夠在快速變遷的資訊社會中立足與發展。
description.en: The course of Information Laws is designed for the students to familiarize such legal issues in most of the aspects available in the current world as information security, internet contracts, domain names, digital copy rights, trademark ownership, individual privacy and the genre & prevention in relation to computers. In addition, we discuss individual cases to further understand the nature of legal issues concerning computerized information. Hopefully, we learn the legal disciplines existent in the virtual and real worlds; besides, the students are supposed to equip themselves with sufficient legal knowledge so that they can survive and thus keep growing in the ever-changing information society.

description.zh: 透過點子激發、設計思考、Hook Model 的學習、假設驗證的過程以及 Business Model Canvas 等方法，學會如何驗證與思索創業計畫，進而撰寫簡潔而有效的創業計畫書。當今時代有許多創業發想，均花費許多時間在撰寫創業計劃書，然而最近的矽谷創業圈已經不再流行一本又一本的創業計劃書（Business Plan / Business Proposal），更重要的其實是如何透過假設的驗證、市場的調查（或理解），以及仔細的規劃設計一個有效的創業計畫，比創業計劃書的撰寫更重要。如同奇點大學所教導 – 如果能改變十億人，那麼必能產生十億元的價值。反之，如果要能產生價值十億的「創業計劃書」，必要先能產生價值十億的「創業計畫」。「書/寫」乃是本門課程的附屬建物，實體建築乃有效「創業計畫」之生成、驗證是也乎。
description.en: A good business plan is build upon a good innovative idea and a good storytelling first; then it will also need certain reasonable structure that can be well understand and clearly present the business idea and its roll out plan. That’s the spirit of BP (Business Plan / Business Proposal). In this course, we will NOT focus on the representation of BP, but focus on the business idea/plan itself.

notes: 創創向度，98-104年度入學者均可修習，為創創向度選修

description.zh: 在上學期開設，一學期，兩學分。斷限：始於日據時期，止於七十年代，以台灣白話文學之生發演進史程為主軸。範圍：涵蓋文字改革運動，第一次鄉土文學論戰，第二次鄉土文學論戰，  本土化文學思想研析、及作品選讀。要求：學期報告一份、期末考。
description.en: Period: From the Japanese sovereighty to the 1980's; emphasizing the history of the vernacular literature. Topics: The movement of the language revolution; the first controversy of folk literature; the second controversy of folk literature; analysis of the literary localization movement and the study of selected works.Requirements: One term paper and a final exam.
