description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學核心)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 著作權法係為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，所特別制定之法律。該法所稱著作包括：語文著作、音樂著作、戲劇、舞蹈著作、美術著作、攝影著作、圖形著作、視聽著作、錄音著作、建築著作、電腦程式著作等。著作權的保障內涵則包含因著作完成所生之著作人格權及著作財產權。本課程將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於著作權的瞭解。
description.en: Copyright Act  is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. "Works" of this act, include the following:1.Oral and literary works.2.Musical works.3.Dramatic and choreographic works.4.Artistic works.5.Photographic works.6.Pictorial and graphical works.7.Audiovisual works.8.Sound recordings.9.Architectural works.10.Computer programs. "Copyright" means the moral rights and economic rights subsisting in a completed work.The discussion in the course covers theory and examples，to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

notes: 創創向度，98-104年度入學者均可修習，為創創向度選修

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 一般認為台灣民間宗教信仰源於中國民間宗教傳說，此說法亦無可厚非，不過台灣民間宗教信仰極重要的特色，已不再是神教文化承接的問題，而是其已轉為在地的以實體寺廟建築場所，作為當地政治社會文化中心所發展出的民間信仰。本課程在讓同學了解台灣地區有哪些歷史悠遠的廟宇主神、事蹟傳說，以及其所帶動的宗教組織和信仰風情。課程包括：1.台灣原住民的巫術與神靈信仰、2.台灣的?時與節慶，如過年與元宵、清明與端午、七夕與普渡、中秋、冬至與尾牙等；3.台灣的主要神明信仰，如媽祖、觀音、關聖帝君、玉皇大帝、玄天上帝、清水祖師、城隍爺、地藏王、福德正神、五府千歲及王船祭等；4.台灣的主要宗教團體如齋教、一貫道、理教、天理教、軒轅教、天帝教、台灣靈乩、符籙學會、儒教學會、亥子道教等。
description.en: "Taiwanese folk religion" involves many dimensions, and it is one the most important applicable knowledge to local education. However, students in elementary and junior high schools still lack of the knowledge in this field. Therefore, the arrangement of lecture, camp, and religious construction regarding to the learning of Taiwanese folk religion is desirable. Hopefully, through all the effort, students could acquire more knowledge about Taiwanese folk religion, and share their learning experience on their daily lives. The main goal of the course is not only to improve the situation that our students have insufficient knowledge about folk religion, but also to help them apply the knowledge on the internet frequently. In addition, we will help students gain more information in this field and improve their learning quality of Taiwanese folk religion in Taiwan. This course include four fields: 1.The various gods that people believe in Taiwan 2.The Taiwanese custom and daily habits 3.The

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 從歷史之反省中，探索人類對未來之創造潛力。詮釋競爭與和諧，個人與國家，現實與理想之雙軌教學，期能栽培專業人力與宏觀之人材。啟發學生比較歸納、以古鑑今的思維能力，使之獲得客觀有用的歷史學識。
description.en: This course is designed to help students explore human creative potential for the future in the light of historical introspection.  This course is an interactive instruction on the following topics: competition vs. harmony, individual vs. nation, reality vs. ideality.  Emphasis will be placed on training students' logical reasoning in analysis, synthesis, comparison, induction, and deduction so that they can acquire useful historical knowledge in an objective way.  In so doing, we hope to cultivate perspective professional intellects.

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學核心)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

name.zh: 博物館創新導覽研究與研發
name.en: R&D of Museum Tour Guide Service

description.zh: 當代各大博物館創新導覽方式為有意從事文化工作之學生須研習的課題。博物館知識似乎已不在侷限於本科系學生才能勝任與報考，未來熟捻多媒體設計的學生也都將是博物館設計與導覽的生力軍。博物館是文化的再現、創作的底蘊，當代博物館隨著科技的進步，已敲敲地掀起導覽革命。博物館文物工作者與空間設計者嘗試以最新穎的互動媒體為21世紀文物導覽寫下創新又創意的一頁。 本課程的設計背景起源於希望結合二位曾在法國與英國深研博物館學、與互動暨視覺傳達創新設計的學者，將其所學進行跨領域結合與教學，提升學生的專業博物館知識，增進文化素養，活化並促進設計研發能力。
description.en: Students setting their sights on cultural work must also familiarize themselves with the innovative guide-service ideas in contemporary museums, whose window seems open to not only students in museum studies, but also those in multimedia arts. A museum is where culture revives and creativity thrives. With the progress of technology, today’s museums have revolutionized their ways of guide service — a collaboration between museum professionals, space designers, and the latest interactive media.This course capitalizes on interdisciplinary teaching approaches, and is guided by two scholars, one receiving her Ph.D. in museum studies in France and the other in visual communication design in the UK, so as to enrich learners’ knowledge of museum studies, cultural literacy, and R&D skills.

description.zh: 使同學具備良好的造形能力，對於今後從事各類型之設計、繪製圖表等均有幫助。教學內容包括筆法及明度練習，室內靜物寫生，室外樹木、建築物之寫生。教學方法：先練習運用鉛筆，使其表現各種筆觸、輕重，再要求造形之準確度，達到形態和質感的表現正確，以及構圖有美感的能力。先由老師示範，而後同學練習
description.en: Equip students with the ability of styling so that their designing and drawing ability can be improved. The teaching material used for this class includes stroke and chiaroscuro, drawing of still life, and nature painting outside. Teaching method: Practice how to use a pencil for the demonstrating various touches in light and heavy strokes.  Students shall learn how to perform  precise styling,  correct expression of formation and personality, and a beautiful configuration. The instructor will give a demonstration first and then students shall follow and learn.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 透過點子激發、設計思考、Hook Model 的學習、假設驗證的過程以及 Business Model Canvas 等方法，學會如何驗證與思索創業計畫，進而撰寫簡潔而有效的創業計畫書。當今時代有許多創業發想，均花費許多時間在撰寫創業計劃書，然而最近的矽谷創業圈已經不再流行一本又一本的創業計劃書（Business Plan / Business Proposal），更重要的其實是如何透過假設的驗證、市場的調查（或理解），以及仔細的規劃設計一個有效的創業計畫，比創業計劃書的撰寫更重要。如同奇點大學所教導 – 如果能改變十億人，那麼必能產生十億元的價值。反之，如果要能產生價值十億的「創業計劃書」，必要先能產生價值十億的「創業計畫」。「書/寫」乃是本門課程的附屬建物，實體建築乃有效「創業計畫」之生成、驗證是也乎。
description.en: A good business plan is build upon a good innovative idea and a good storytelling first; then it will also need certain reasonable structure that can be well understand and clearly present the business idea and its roll out plan. That’s the spirit of BP (Business Plan / Business Proposal). In this course, we will NOT focus on the representation of BP, but focus on the business idea/plan itself.

notes: 創創向度，98-104年度入學者均可修習，為創創向度選修

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車、碳回收等；「節能科技」則包括節能住宅、變頻空調等主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。教學目的：綠色科技為21世紀最重要的科技，除了維繫人類在地球上的永續生存外，發展綠色科技更是對抗目前全球金融危機的唯一途徑。本課程希望透過介紹綠色科技，進而喚醒大家對環境的關懷與愛護，更重要的是透過介紹綠色科技的原理，讓更多年輕人瞭解綠色科技，期待綠色科技能在台灣真正技術生根。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, carbon recapture, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.  教學目的：    Green technology is the most important technology in the 21st century. It does not only influence the human ever life on the earth, but is also the unique road against the present global financial crisis. This course wishes people to care for and love the earth by way of understanding the green technologies. Moreover, this course hope to let more young people

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

name.en: The Development of Taiwan Technology History

description.zh: 台灣科技發展史將討論二十世紀前半（1900-1950）部份重要技術引入台灣後，造成的影響與社會變遷。依時間先後，先從農業技術的變革-綠色革命。其次研讀有關電力與水利的技術發展，然後進入工業化初期的台灣社會變遷，以及二次大戰期間軍需工業所引導出的初期重化工業。除了這些技術與產業變革之外，也將兼論及技術人物群像與職業教育的開端。
description.en: The main topics for class will discuss the important technology how to influence Taiwan society during 1900-1950. This class includes some important developments: Green revolution -it discuss about agriculture development; the technology development of electricity and water conservancy. In some topic we discuss about Taiwan society change in early days industrialization and chemical industry during world war II. Except those topics, technologists and the beginning of professional education in Taiwan will be introduced.

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en: This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2)討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3)探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異(4)如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會核心)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 本課程主要在從人生內在活動面向使學生明瞭宗教與人生的關係。首先探究人生的意義與特性，次則經由對宗教哲學，比較宗教學與宗教現象學的瞭解，來分析人生的問題。內容特別強調文化對人生的影響，宗教乃是深層文化原則所繫，同時人生問題也能引發宗教的適應與發展等等。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to approach of " Action Immanent ", enabling students to realize the relation of religions and life. First, to study the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life. Second,through the understanding of "Philosophy of Religion "、" Comparative Religion " and "Phenomenology of Religion ", to analyze the problems of life. Emphasis is on culture and the influence of life, as religion is a foundation supporting culture where problems of life can stimulate the adaptation and development of religion.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 課程目的在以宏觀的視野，探索宇宙間生命的起源、演化與消失。課程內容：1.開天闢地－宇宙的誕生 2.神秘的黑洞 3.太空探險 I－神話與幻想時代 4. 太空探險II－科學研究與太空殖民時代 5.外星人存在嗎？ 6.從哈伯看宇宙 7.最美麗的行星－地球 8.克卜勒行星運動三大定律 9.彗星撞地球－宇宙中的災難 10.宇宙的盡頭。
description.en: Purpose: Exploration of the Universe with a micro-view on how it began, evolved and died. The content includes 1. The Big Bang 2.Mysterious black hole 3.Exploration of the Universe I -imagine and dream 4.Exploration of the Universe II - Scientific research and the space colonial times 5.Does E. T. exist？ 6.Watch the Universe from a Hobble telescope 7.The most beautiful planet-the earth 8.Kepler's law 9.Deep impact-the catastrophe in Universe 10.The end of the Universe

name.zh: 法國文化資產與紙設計創新研發
name.en: French Cultural Heritage and R&D of Innovative Paper Art & Design

description.zh: 法國文化資產理念先進，文化與紙設計為全球設計人士取經之地。本課程的設計背景起源於希望結合設計人才、文化資產與藝術的學者、學生與臺灣埔里本地紙業之能源，達成跨領域教學，提升學生的藝術文化底蘊，活化並促進紙設計研發能力，豐富創新本校通識教育課程、促進臺灣紙業與學生的設計水平。探究法國的文化資產，也是進而了解法國設計如何從文化中萃取精華再創作。讓同學由法國的案例，除了增進國際視野以外，進而思考本土及異國文化與紙設計的關係，為創意主題發想。
description.en: France has magnetized global design talents with its exemplary avant-garde ideas, one of them being paper arts and crafts. This interdisciplinary course aims to incorporate different elements — designers, scholars, students, and Puli’s (埔里) paper industry — to enrich learners’ cultural literacy and R&D skills, further motivating student designers and Taiwan’s paper industry to advance their creativity. By inquiring into the French cultural heritage, students are expected to not only cultivate diversified global views, but, specifically, learn how French designers transform existing cultural elements into cutting-edge ideas as regards paper arts and crafts.

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

notes: 98-102年度入學(哲學核心)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

name.en: Cross Strait Relations and International Politics

description.zh: 本課程由全球化框架來檢視兩岸關係的演進、現況、及發展趨勢。由政治、經濟、乃至社會心理層面分析海峽兩岸錯綜複雜的互動關係。並檢視國際政治經濟體系中，美國與日本兩大國對兩岸關係的影響。
description.en: This introductory course on the complex cross-strait interactions will examineTaiwan’s role in the intricate web of international power politics; as well as the structure of hegemonic power rivalry, particularly Sino-US-Japan triangle, and its impact on cross strait relations. The material will cover the evolution, status quo, and developmental path of the cross strait relations in a global framework.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

notes: 創創向度，98-104年度入學者均可修習，為創創向度選修

description.zh: 本課程教導學生了解新創事業在智慧財產權與專利管理的基本知識，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行: (1) 新創事業智慧財產權的基本觀念與實務， (2) 專利資訊分析，(3) 專利演化與發展 ，(4) 創意產出，(5) 專利申請與保護 (6) 專利佈局 (7) 專利侵權鑑定 (8) 專利迴避設計 (9) 案例討論與分析。
description.en: This course teaches students Intellectual Property Rights and patent management for Entrepreneurship. The course includes topics as follows: (1) Basic knowledge and practices of Entrepreneurship Intellectual Property Rights; (2) The analysis of patent information; (3) The evolution and development for patent; (4) Innovative idea generation; (5) Application and protection of patent (6) Patent strategy (7) Patent violation，(8) Patent avoidance，(9) Cases study.

notes: 創創向度，98-104年度入學者均可修習，為創創向度選修

description.zh: 透過點子激發、設計思考、Hook Model 的學習、假設驗證的過程以及 Business Model Canvas 等方法，學會如何驗證與思索創業計畫，進而撰寫簡潔而有效的創業計畫書。當今時代有許多創業發想，均花費許多時間在撰寫創業計劃書，然而最近的矽谷創業圈已經不再流行一本又一本的創業計劃書（Business Plan / Business Proposal），更重要的其實是如何透過假設的驗證、市場的調查（或理解），以及仔細的規劃設計一個有效的創業計畫，比創業計劃書的撰寫更重要。如同奇點大學所教導 – 如果能改變十億人，那麼必能產生十億元的價值。反之，如果要能產生價值十億的「創業計劃書」，必要先能產生價值十億的「創業計畫」。「書/寫」乃是本門課程的附屬建物，實體建築乃有效「創業計畫」之生成、驗證是也乎。
description.en: A good business plan is build upon a good innovative idea and a good storytelling first; then it will also need certain reasonable structure that can be well understand and clearly present the business idea and its roll out plan. That’s the spirit of BP (Business Plan / Business Proposal). In this course, we will NOT focus on the representation of BP, but focus on the business idea/plan itself.

notes: 創創向度，98-104年度入學者均可修習，為創創向度選修

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

notes: 限外籍生修讀(文化向度)

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

notes: 限外籍生修讀(歷史向度)

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。

We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

notes: 限外籍生修讀(社哲/哲學向度)

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

notes: 創創向度,B班 (此為一般班英文授課,也是特殊學生專班)

name.en: Applications of Internet of Things ( IoT )

description.zh: 「物聯網（智慧聯網）」被視為繼個人電腦、網際網路之後，世界資訊產業的第三波浪潮。隨著科技的進步，網路早已成為人與人重要的溝通管道之一，而在未來的世界，透過物聯網技術，將賦予物件智慧並擁有與其它物件或人溝通的能力，換言之，未來網路不再只是人與人的溝通管道，更是聯繫全球物與物、人與物的橋樑。未來智慧型裝置有望相互連結、分享資料，進而改變人們的日常生活與企業的運作模式。
description.en: The Internet of Things ( IoT ) is regarded as the third wave after the invention of personal computer and the Internet.Through technological progress, the Internet has become an important way for people to communicate. In the future, the IoT technologies will enable objects to communicate with other objects, or human beings.In other words, the Internet will not only become a bridge between human beings, but also between objects, or even between human beings and objects.Future smart devices will be connected and shared across each other, changing how human beings live on a daily basis, and how enterprises operate.

notes: 創創向度，98-104年度入學者均可修習，為創創向度選修

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course includes international economic environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.

description.zh: 設計領導係指領導設計與透過設計領導事業，環視益形挑戰與機會的設計創新環境，深具前瞻洞察力的願景與策略是贏得設計領導地位之關鍵因素。本課程含蓋相關文獻理論與實務案例，透過個案研討深入探究如何贏得企業設計領導競爭優勢與永續繁榮成功之道。
description.en: Design leadership means to design and to lead-to lead design and to lead business by design. Today, those responsible for design creation face leadership challenges and opportunities greater than ever before. Who should lead design? Who leads by design? How and why does a company "lead with design?" Design leadership has many interpretations, ranging from inspiration to collaboration and from culture to globalization. Design leadership is a commercial imperative. It creates differentiation, sustains competitive advantage, and enables world-class performance that is sustainable into the future. This course will provide the insight and interaction essential to utilizing design leadership for business success. Vision and strategy are the critical elements of leadership. It covers the strategy and the effects of inspiring design leadership and the personal characteristics and attributes of great design leaders.

notes: 設計博與創新碩士班合開

description.zh: 跨文化溝通, 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之設計。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved intercultural communication and design project with research and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory and practice in research and development dealing with the design project is reviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution to the field of design base on supportive research. The study of related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. The course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 創業者通常無經營企業之經驗，多數創業者在擁有很好的產品時創業，同時必須要能規劃出商業經營模式、經營規模、經營團隊、行銷策略、損益兩平點、現金流量、預期投資報酬率、資金需求、可能風險等事項，才能評估創業成功機率，設定創業經營的停損點，創業者才能提高創業的成功率。對於理工科系人員，而具有優良技術能力，且有志於創業者，本課程為增強上述人才創業素養的重要課程之一。
description.en: Entrepreneurs often do not have enterprises experience. Most of entrepreneurs start their business with very good products, at the same time, they must be able to plan out the business model, business scale, management team, marketing strategy, break-even point, cash flows, expected investment rate of return, capital requirements, possible risks and other matters, in order to estimate the probability of success and set a stop-loss point. Then entrepreneurs are more possible to succeed in their enterprise. For science and engineering personnel with excellent technical ability who want to become entrepreneurs, this course is one of the important courses to enhance the abilities for enterprise.

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解金融體系的運作，其中包括了金融中介機構、金融市場、金融工具，以及政府對金融產業的法令規範。此外，本課程亦從金融理論面的角度探討金融市場機制與金融機構運作，其之所以存在以的理由以及其所扮演之角色。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the financial system, including the financial intermediaries, financial markets, financial instruments, and government regulations.  In addition, this course is going to provide a conceptual framework to help students understand why markets exist and what their roles are in the financial environment.

name.zh: 就業達人講座:職涯增能探索Ⅱ
name.en: Lecture: Increase capacity for career exploration Ⅱ

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「就業達人講座-職涯增能探索」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試應對技巧、魅力溝通表達、職場自我行銷、職場生涯規劃以及職場時間管理、壓力管理等議課題，提昇學生對於職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students’ competition and ability in the workplace. The course contains some subjects including tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career etc. By these topics, students will have variety of skills about interview and management that needed in the workplace to raise employment rate.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:跨文化溝通Ⅱ
name.en: Feast for the global perspective—Cross-cultural communication II

description.zh: 本課程藉由邀請校內外之社會、政治、經濟、文化等專家學者與莘莘學子們進行相互交流，透過「全球議題」、「文化學習」等主題之進階探討，培養學生世界公民之意識，提升學生跨文化溝通能力、適應全球化生活與國際競爭力。
description.en: We invite the domestic speakers, as the outstanding scholars of cross-cultural communication, to share their knowledge and experiences with students. By exploring the global issues such as social, cultural, political or economic studies, the course makes students learn further about the world, and inspires students to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language II

description.zh: 課程以培養泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。
description.en: This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:東協商務、文化
name.en: Development of global perspective: the series of ASEAN Community

description.zh: 東南亞地區向來為台灣的重要經貿夥伴，而東協十國已決定於2015年效法歐盟成立經濟共同體(ASEAN Community)，並積極尋求與日本、中國、南韓、印度、澳洲與紐西蘭等六國，簽署雙邊自由貿易協定，希望未來能建立一個30億人口、年經濟產值達九兆美元的「東亞自由貿易區」。希望藉由此次課程，讓學生瞭解東協成立後，臺灣的未來產業與市場發展，並在經濟不景氣，就業不容易的時代裡，提供學生另一個就業新契機。
description.en: Southeast Asia has been the most important economic and trading partner with Taiwan. Association of Southeast Asian Nations decided to found ASEAN Community in 2015 which takes European Union as a model. At the same time, it is vigorously looking for signing the Bilateral Free Trade Agreement with Japan, China, South Korea, India, Australia and New Zealand for the purpose of establishing an East Asia Free Trade Zone which accounts for the population of 3 billion of people and 9 trillion of GDP. We hope that we can make students learn more of the developments and industry of Taiwan after the establishment of ASEAN Free Trade Area (AFTA). Besides, it can provide students another employment opportunity in this era of recession and high unemployment rate.

description.en: This class is going to invite investment experts from Yuanta Futures and Yuanta Securities to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

description.zh: 本課程藉「課程引導」來協助學生探索自身潛能，認識與學習未來擔任領導者經營團隊之能力；另透過編組進行「實務參與」，進而體驗提升團隊能量之方式，並在投入的過程當中，學習組織與企劃、接納與包容、宣傳與分工、建構人脈關係網以及增進問題解決能力，以培養未來職場之領袖人才。最後藉由期末成果發表會，引導學生結合學術理論基礎及業界實務操作，將所學做最好之發揮，協助同學未來於職場工作無縫銜接之目標。
description.en: The “course guidance” assists students to explore self-potential and to recognize and learn the team-management capability of the future leader. The “Practical participation” let students experience how to increase team-energy, and study: organizing and planning, accepting and tolerating, propaganda and cooperation, constructing personal connections, problem solving, for cultivating the future leader. Finally, an achievements ceremony will be held to show the results and train the students to combine the theoretical principal and practical application for their future work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' competence in English through reading popularculture. The reading will cover a wide variety of "texts" in popular literature, film, music, sports, television and on the Net.  Special emphasis will be put on rhetoric analysis, text summarization, and critical comprehension skills such as identifying themain ideas and supporting details, recognizing context clues, drawing inferences and making critical judgments

name.en: English Presentation for Academic Purposes & Discussion

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授學術簡報要點、介紹常用句型和字彙，主要加強學生英語口語表達流暢及準確度。透過認識簡報流程與架構提昇學術及工作所需之英文簡報能力。
description.en: A course for students giving oral academic presentations in colleges and universities. Learner outcomes include general academic vocabulary development, listening skill improvement in an academic setting, development of effective note-taking skills, and improved academic discussion and presentation skills. Activities include formal presentations, discussions, and reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 在目前資訊爆增的社會中，從事教學工作確實不是一件很輕鬆的工作。當今國內的教育方式是大量的資訊必須利用有限的時間，在指定的空間內，傳播給必須接受者。此一工作勢必要借助於相當妥善的媒介或手段才能做到。因此，從事教育工作者如何研究和運用適切的媒體來教學已成為不可忽視的課題。本課程的重點在介紹教學媒體的涵義、分類與功能、如何進行教學傳播，以及媒體教學的基本理論。 本課程擬培養之核心能力與指標： 2-1具備課程與教學設計能力。2-2具備善用教學策略進行有效教學之能力。2-3具備運用適切方法進行學習評量之能力。(各項指標內容請點連結詳閱了解)
description.en: The purpose of this course is to let students understand how to make teaching material for every different course. The contents of this course include how to make transparency, slide, and video tape. Furthermore, MS Office PowerPoint will be introduced in this class.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

notes: 限外籍生修讀(社會/社哲向度)

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

description.zh: 21世紀全球化浪潮席捲人類生活各個領域，國家邊界正在消失，人們都是「地球村」的村民，並且已逐漸體認到無論是政治、經濟、文化或社會層面都受其他村民的影響。本課題擬從以上四個視角協助同學認知全球化問題，從而構思(總體面)國家的發展策略以及(個體面)企業的經營佈局對策。課程內容包括：全球化與國家主權(國家認同、國家職能)、全球化與國際分工(跨國公司、利益分配)、全球化與文明衝突(文化帝國、民族主義)、全球化與社會風險(公民社會、社會安全)、全球化與全球治理(秩序重建、利益共容)。
description.en: Globalization tide sweeps across each field of human life in the21st century. National boundaries are disappearing. People are all the villagers in the” global village”, and have realized gradually that they have been influenced by other villagers no matter politically, economically, culturally or socially. This course is designed to further students’ understanding on globalization issue from the above-mentioned four angles, thus help them shape both country’s development strategy and enterprises’ management planning. The course content includes: Globalization and state sovereignty (national identity, functions of the state), globalization and international division (trans-corporation, distribution of interests), globalization and civilization conflict (cultural imperialism, nationalism), globalization and social risk (citizen's society, social safety), globalization and global governance (order- rebuilding, interests-encompassing).

notes: 98-102年度入學(社會選修)，103-104入學(社哲選修)

description.zh: 本課程係透過對文化之研究與解析，解構出具備設計發展之要素，並藉由設計專題之研討，實際應用文化意涵進行設計創作，發展出具創新之商品與服務，藉以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計應用之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on the deconstruction of design element through the study and analysis of culture. This course also focuses on the training of students’ ability of multiple-culture analysis and design application through the design topic seminar and cultural-meaning-applied design practice that develop innovative products and service.

notes: 創新設計碩士--日、職合開

name.zh: 國際專業證照研訓進階講座
name.en: Advance Seminar of International Professional Certification

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本「國際專業證照研訓進階講座」課程針對國際性專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國際專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。本學期專門培訓學生通過Microsoft 國際證照之PowerPoint 與ACCESS為目標，以協助同學建立跨領域與國際化能力之專長。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the advance of international professional licenses in management, nurture students to participate in international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate international professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation. This semester will help students to pass the licenses of PowerPoint and ACCESS, and further to obtain the interdisciplinary expertise with international capabilities.

notes: 與最後一哩合開，計網電腦教室，限60人

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋能源開發及儲存過程中之有機、無機及觸媒材料之介紹以及材料檢測光譜技術。授課重點介紹各項材料檢測技術包含BET，紅外線光譜，拉曼光譜和阻抗。從分子觀點至巨觀角度探討天然氣轉化液體燃料，燃料電池，太陽能電池，發光二極管，能源儲存及CO2捕獲程序。
description.en: This course covers organic, inorganic and catalytic materials for energy generation and storage processes as well as spectroscopic techniques for material characterization.   Topics for characterization includes BET, infrared, Raman, and Impedance.  Gas to liquid fuel, fuel cell, solar cell, light-emitting diodes, energy storage, and CO2 capture processes will be discussed from molecular mechanistic level to the macroscopic device level.

notes: 欲加選本課程，請洽化工系辦

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

notes: 電機所、電子系所與最後一哩合開,實驗課,限20人

name.en: Young Entrepreneurs of the Future - YEF

description.zh: YEF計畫希望培育年輕人敢開創、勇於接受挑戰、善於解決問題的創業精神，為社 會注入永續發展的人才活水。本計畫是一個跨領域、跨國際、跨自我的學習計畫，鼓勵學子跨校、跨院聯結，經由長達 6~10 個月的模擬實務學習，試鍊團隊合作、創新創 業精神、執行力及國際網絡能力，在國內是備受推崇的『第二軌』教育計畫。
description.en: The YEF program aims to plant the seeds of enterpreneurship among our younger generation.  We hope that, with this entrepreneurship, the young people can be more proactive to innovate, to take on any challenges, and even to overcome the difficulties along the way. Thus we hope this will eventually inject new vigor and vitality into our society.

notes: 系所,最後一哩合開,報名YEF計畫再加選,參加2/22說明會

description.zh: 公共藝術涉題人文、藝術、空間、社會、設計等領域，本課程藉由介紹台灣及世界各地之公共藝術發展，推廣公共藝術的整體概念，使學子了解公共藝術的重要性，也藉此培養學生的專業知能、人文素養及藝術鑑賞能力。
description.en: The public art involves the humanities, arts, spatial, social, and design fields, this course introduces the development of the public art in Taiwan and the world to promote the whole concept of public art, so that students can understand the importance of the public art, but also to take this training the student's professional knowledge, humanities, and arts appreciation.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

description.zh: 觀摩學習長春集團以研發、創新、工安、環保為企業文化之核心元素，為台灣率先引領石化業邁向高值化的典範企業集團。以真實具體的化工裝置設計、研發、創新、工安、環保經驗為教材，進而激發學生追求化工科技創新的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: The course will invite the domestic business of Chang Chun Group to share their success experiences and new technologies. By offering the real design of chemical process equipments, research and innovation in development, industrial safety and hygiene, environmental protection and specific examples. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement of chemical engineering to strengthen their innovation wills to plan the future.

name.zh: 行政程序法與行政訴訟法

description.zh: 行政程序法係為使行政行為遵循公正、公開與民主之程序，確保依法行政之原則，以保障人民權益，提高行政效能，增進人民對行政之信賴所制定之法律，其為行政機關辦理行政行為之基本法。行政訴訟法則提供司法救濟程序，保障人民權益，確保國家行政權之合法行使。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，強化同學對於行政程序法與行政訴訟法的認識，並培養同學準備相關國家考試的基礎。
description.en: Administrative Procedure Act is enacted to ensure that all administrative acts are carried out in pursuance of a fair, open and democratic process based on the principle of administration by law so as to protect the rights and interest of the people, enhance administrative efficiency and further the people's reliance on administration. dministrative Litigation Act  offers   judicial remedies procedure to  ensure  rights  of  the  people .The discussion in the course covers theory and examples，to enhance a deeper understanding of Administrative Procedure Act and Administrative Litigation Act for the students and to equip them with a wider knowledge base for further national screening tests.

name.zh: 基頻通訊積體電路設計實驗
name.en: Baseband Communication Integrated Circuits Design Laboratory

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計基頻通訊積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計基頻通訊積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1. 數位傳輸 2. 頻道模式 3. 接收器設計 4. 進階系統設計
description.en: This course trains the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of baseband communication integrated circuits. Therefore, the student has the design capability of baseband communication integrated circuits. The contents of this course: 1. Digital transmission; 2. Channel model; 3. Receiver design; 4. Advanced systems design

notes: 電子系、電機系三年級合開，限45人

description.zh: 機械相關產業內涵、發展現況介紹，願景及全球布局。另邀請相關企業主管，以演講的方式介紹上述課題在該公司的推動與應用，以增加同學對產業實務的認識，並縮短畢業後就業、學習、摸索的時間。
description.en: This course offers Machinery Industry connotations, introducing the current situation of development, vision and global distribution. To let students have a better understanding of these topics and promote the practice experiences, this course invites industry managers to give lectures for these issues.

name.en: Intelligent Applications of Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生機器學習、大數據等人工智慧技術，並使用在物聯網的創新與應用上。課程內容包括：人工智慧概論、大數據方法、機器學習方法、資料探勘方法、最佳化方法、物聯網概論、影音處理、雲端技術、物聯網系統實作等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of artificial intelligent methods and apply these methods to innovative applications of Internet of Things. The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師王冠生.三峽北大公學院1F01,博雅社哲/哲

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師林子晴.三峽北大商學院1F01,博雅文化向度

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 5-7節,教師李克寰.三峽北大社會學院113,博雅社哲/哲學

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師林子晴.三峽北大商學院1F01,博雅文化向度

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

notes: 教師陳志華.三峽北大公學院1F16,博雅法治向度

description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師謝宗宜,北醫大6202教室,博雅選修社哲/哲學向度

The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師林文琪,北醫大美學教室,博雅選修社哲/哲學向度

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

description.zh: 從設計產業經營之立足點探討經典服務理論如：服務品質、服務設計與服務體驗工程（S.E.E.）之應用與實踐。授課內容側重於基礎服務理論與最新服務科學方法的介紹，並選擇特定服務產業進行實務研習對象。課程預計以主題講授、專家座談、分組研習方式進行，並分三期評量服務研習成果。
description.en: The course aims at the training of applying prominent service theories and methods such as Service Quality, Service Design, Service Experience Engineering (S.E.E.) to the management of design service. It proceeds in the forms of topics lecturing, professional speeches and groups study. The result of study is evaluated in three stages accordingly.

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.en: Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. 1st GradeThrough manipulation of different design topics, the disciples learn to understand the relational relationship between theory and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation which includes design result and a report of the process of the ascertainment will be required for evaluation.
